story:
Short Summary

I am a Peace Corps volunteer that has been living in Tameslohte for a year. I have my Bachelor's of Urban Planning & Design and I am currently pursuing my Master's of Community Development while in Peace Corps. Since arriving here I have been shown the town through the locals eyes and how fickle the government is in implementing social service projects. I am fortunate to have my friend Abderrahmane Ait Lqous (Bachelor of Sociology of Enterprise) guide me through how bureaucracy works in Morocco.

I have been working with locals, students and associations on how to solve the current environmental issue in Tameslohte, Morocco. The initial plan was to address the trash management problem in our town. Thanks to the funding we were able to stir up enough talk that the local government beat us to the punch; installing 15 trash cans in the center of town. However, it was ill planned and there is no policy set in place. Fortunately, they are now asking for help to create a long term waste management policy. We are working on this now. Thank you for all your support!

The Plan

As promised, the excess funds are being used for projects  associated with our Environmental Club. These projects will include buying trash bags, gloves and transport of trash with our trash pick-ups/Buying paint and materials for implementing environmental murals throughout town/Gathering craft materials for executing educational environmental projects within local schools/orphanage which we will rotate throughout every month. 

The Impact

Since our local government has finally done something about our trash can company simply from word of mouth of our recent trash can project we are going to continue pushing the envelope.
We started with one of the largest project ideas ever and it is starting to unravel in front of our eyes. Now, this isn't a project to say, "Ope! Great! Did my deed, now I can go!" The most important key in community development is sustainability. Meaning, what keys can you leave to easily open the locks to resources left behind.
We plan to implement this not only through pick-ups, murals, and projects but also something more tangible such as workshops. We will create step by step tool-kits in english and Moroccan arabic. For incoming volunteers and Moroccans. These will include, but not limited to, Project Design Management/CV & Resume Building/Personal Marketing & Design/Environmental Club Projects/Project Fundraising and others if need-be.

Risks & Challenges

As any project entails there is always the risk of participation. For our Environmental Club it is our initiative to bring in students, associations and stakeholders to support our projects. 

Currently, there is an attempt to establish a You Council on the local Commune Board. This will act as an adversary to projects and ideas created by the underrepresented youth in our town.

The biggest challenge is working with the local government. Our local government is corrupt, like most small towns in developing countries. They only give project money to those who are willing to vote for them. Fortunately, for establishing a youth council we will have a voice on the commune board. With adequate support from resources such indiegogo and creating a project proposal It just comes down to their support. 

This is why I prefer to use crowdfunding sites to fundraise for my projects while here because 1) It helps streamline the process of completing projects. 2) The local government will approve anything if they don't have to pay for it.

Monthly Trash Pickups: 400 DH = 43 $

One Mural: 1000 DH = 106 $

Monthly Educational Projects:  350 DH = 37 $

The reason I have made this a continuously running campaign is because  this doesn't end at on project or mural but is more powered by the people pushing for these changes. I know the potential is here and I am ready to establish the project competency here.

FYI a dollar can go a long way here! $1 = 9.5 MAD (Moroccan Dirhams)

Thank you :)

story: In order to continue working and supporting her family,Alura needs desperately to have her car repaired, ASAP. She is the only means of support her children have. The money will be used to repair the damaged engine/front end and to provide interval transportation while it is being fixed.

story:
Ce n’est plus un secret, afin d’élever d’un cran son potentiel de service, le Gisement Bistro-chocolaterie déménage. Bien que nous misions sur une recette familière et déjà appréciée par notre clientèle, le Gisement raffinera son art de travailler et de marier les délices du chocolat dans un tout nouvel établissement.

Nous prévoyons vous accueillir dans notre nouvel environnement dès juin, au 57 avenue Principale.

Vous y retrouverez une boutique renouvelée et foisonnante de produits et un point de vue sur la raison d’être du déménagement : le laboratoire de chocolats.

En plus, avec des heures d'ouverture prolongées, un menu novateur, un service de bières en fût et une nouvelle ambiance engageante, le bistro saura, nous l’espérons, vous charmer et consolider votre appétit pour les petites voluptés.  

>> Consultez le plan du futur établissement





Depuis 2010, le Gisement tempère du chocolat afin de perfectionner cet art et d’en faire un produit fin. Le tempérage du chocolat est la base de la création du chocolatier. Pour un volume important, un espace adéquat prêt à accueillir l’équipement spécialisé est nécessaire.

Le 57 rue Principale répondra à ce standard en nous permettant une production à la hauteur de la demande. D'importantes sommes seront investis pour l’équipement, l’aménagement, les moules professionnels, les accessoires et le système de contrôle de la température de cette pièce.

Aidez nous à mettre en marche notre laboratoire en nous encourageant sur place ou par le biais de cette campagne de financement. Toutes vos contributions de départ serviront à l’achat, à la mise en marche et au rodage de nos appareils tout en nous assurant une première vague de production.



Vous désirez nous aider autrement? Contribuez à la visibilité de notre projet en partageant notre page avec vos proches! Ce coup de pouce est tout autant apprécié.



Vos papilles croient avoir tout goûté? Laissez-nous vous surprendre avec nos étonnants produits, tel le bacon et chocolat, les mendiants et autres spécialité du chocolat. Notre créativité et notre expérience n’auront que peu de limites et sauront vous garder à l’affut.

Depuis 2008, nous nous spécialisons dans les mariages du chocolat. Pour les petites dents sucrées, ce format est idéal pour une dégustation avec un café, un thé ou même une bière. Sur place ou pour emporter, nous aurons une grande gamme à vous présenter pour vos dégustations.

Vous raffolez de nos fondues mais ce soir, c’est la maison qui vous appelle? Bonne nouvelle! Nos chocolats à fondue seront disponibles à emporter. Venez choisir votre saveur de chocolat préférée; lait, blanc, noir et même nos saisonnières. Suivez notre recette et le tour est joué! Simple et délicieuse, il ne manque qu’à y plonger vos fruits préférés.

Fidèle à nous-même, nous vouons une réelle passion à créer une grande diversité de chocolats chauds, afin de ravir tout un chacun. Nous ne laisserons aucun gourmet au dépourvu ! Plusieurs nouveautés sont à venir!



Revenez aux sources et sustentez votre appétit avec une petite douceur en barre. Vous trouverez sans aucun doute tablette à votre bouche parmi notre éventail de saveurs. Nos tablettes inclus une recette dans leur emballage, vous permettant de reproduire un chocolat chaud du gisement dans le confort de votre foyer.


Détaillants : Nous sommes toujours intéressés à travailler de concert avec les commerçants. Il nous fera plaisir de développer un produit spécialement pour vous. 

Corporatif : Pour une soirée, un événement, un organisme, un festival, etc. Nous vous offrons la chance de proposer une grande gamme de chocolats et de personnaliser l’emballage et les saveurs offertes.

Campagne de financement : Vous avez besoin de financement pour votre équipe sportive, vos projets d’écoles, un organisme,  il est possible d’offrir l’or en barre. Un chocolat de qualité, personnalisé selon vos besoins.

Pour plus d'informations : info@gisement.ca

Pioche et pelle en main pour cette exploration, nous vous présentons d’ici quelques semaines notre nouveau Gisement.

BIENVENUE !

P.S. Plusieurs événements sont à venir. Nous dévoilerons certains événements ici-même, restez à l'affût.
story_txt:
Ce n’est plus un secret, afin d’élever d’un cran son potentiel de service, le Gisement Bistro-chocolaterie déménage. Bien que nous misions sur une recette familière et déjà appréciée par notre clientèle, le Gisement raffinera son art de travailler et de marier les délices du chocolat dans un tout nouvel établissement.
Nous prévoyons vous accueillir dans notre nouvel environnement dès juin, au 57 avenue Principale.Vous y retrouverez une boutique renouvelée et foisonnante de produits et un point de vue sur la raison d’être du déménagement : le laboratoire de chocolats.En plus, avec des heures d'ouverture prolongées, un menu novateur, un service de bières en fût et une nouvelle ambiance engageante, le bistro saura, nous l’espérons, vous charmer et consolider votre appétit pour les petites voluptés.  

>> Consultez le plan du futur établissement






Depuis 2010, le Gisement tempère du chocolat afin de perfectionner cet art et d’en faire un produit fin. Le tempérage du chocolat est la base de la création du chocolatier. Pour un volume important, un espace adéquat prêt à accueillir l’équipement spécialisé est nécessaire. 
Le 57 rue Principale répondra à ce standard en nous permettant une production à la hauteur de la demande. D'importantes sommes seront investis pour l’équipement, l’aménagement, les moules professionnels, les accessoires et le système de contrôle de la température de cette pièce.
Aidez nous à mettre en marche notre
laboratoire en nous encourageant sur place ou par le biais de cette campagne de
financement. Toutes vos contributions de départ serviront à l’achat, à la mise en
marche et au rodage de nos appareils tout en nous assurant une première vague
de production.





Vous désirez nous aider autrement? Contribuez à la visibilité de notre projet en partageant notre page avec vos proches! Ce coup de pouce est tout autant apprécié.



Vos papilles croient avoir tout goûté? Laissez-nous vous surprendre avec nos étonnants produits, tel le bacon et chocolat, les mendiants et autres spécialité du chocolat. Notre créativité et notre expérience n’auront que peu de limites et sauront vous garder à l’affut.
Depuis 2008, nous nous spécialisons dans les mariages du chocolat. Pour les petites dents sucrées, ce format est idéal pour une dégustation avec un café, un thé ou même une bière. Sur place ou pour emporter, nous aurons une grande gamme à vous présenter pour vos dégustations.

saveurs offertes.

Pour plus d'informations : info@gisement.ca

et pelle en main pour cette exploration, nous vous présentons d’ici quelques
semaines notre nouveau Gisement.

story:
In business everything takes twice as long, costs twice as much and yields half the result.

                But sometimes the unexpected expense hits you hard when you least expect it.

                We are three months away from opening our Literary Themed Bed and Breakfast in Gwenyfar’s childhood home.  The renovation has been a long marathon to get here – but it has been rewarding. Last week, the downstairs A/C system died a noble death.  It gave 31 years of service.  But it went gently into that good night and has left us without climate control in July. The price tag for a new system is coming in at about $8,000.00.  Not only do we need to pay for the unit itself, the down payment has eaten up much of the capital we had set aside for the big bills on the horizon: insurance and taxes.

                We could pursue a bank loan, and we might still have to… however, we would rather not if at all possible.

                We are not asking for a donation or a hand out.

                We are trying to pre-sell the services of the B&B, The Loft and the Tour to raise the money to finish the B&B project.  Because we would rather owe our community than a bank. We would rather connect with you and give you our promise, than a bank. We would rather have a date to see you, talk with you and share our love of books, people and community, than fill out payment coupons to the bank.

                If you have been considering the Literary History Walking Tour or a night in The Loft, please think about it now! Do you have family coming to visit this fall? Or over the Holidays? Would you consider purchasing tickets for the Walking Tour now to have in hand for when they arrive?  Would you like to have a super awesome place for them to stay where you can play life size scrabble or chess? A place where someone else cleans and does the laundry?  Please consider us and please consider purchasing a tour or stay package now. We would really appreciate it. Thank you.

 

If you could share this with friends and family far and wide we would appreciate it. 

www.OldBooksonFrontSt.com

https://www.thetopshelfaliteraryloft.com/

All funds raised will be used for the B&B's A/C system.  If, by some miracle, we pre-sell more than the goal, the additional funds will go to replenish the taxes and insurance fund (not sexy, but necessary).

We have been steadily working on this project for over three years. We are so close to putting it all together and showing you what it can be. Please join us as we cross the finish line.

 

But most important- please come by the bookstore and see us.  Seeing you, talking books with you, going on the Walking Tour with you, and sending you home with the book you have been looking for - those are the reasons we open the doors everyday.

story:
We are Egon and Susana Lesizza. The wonderful destiny brought us together 4 years ago, but our amazing magic story started more than 70 years ago. Beside to share our personal dreams, we have fused our talent to reach our professional dreams.

Find This Campaign On:

Award-winning blog 

MLADIPODJETNIK piše o nas...

FINANCE pišejo o nas...

The passion for wine and the picturesque landscapes of the spectacular region of Goriška Brda - Slovenia were the source of our inspiration and so was born our private label wine Lesizza Gold 22k.

With your valuable support we will achieve that the majestic wine Lesizza Gold 22k will become the special guest of the best moments and parties in your country.

With great pride we present you:

is the magnificent fusion of elegance, taste and exclusivity. It is a high quality wine with a great aroma and flavor combined with 22-karat edible gold.

Lesizza Gold 22k is an authentic and luxurious wine that should be present in the most special moments, it is perfect to surprise your partner on a romantic dinner, guests of your wedding celebration or your business partners in a distinguished dinner.

The wine Lesizza Gold 22k is a special guest of the most glamorous and exclusive events, available in 2 types: Chardonnay and Rose at affordable price.


Find This Campaign On / Encuentra nuestra campaña en:

NOTIMEX publico...

PULSO Diario de San Luis publico...

MexicoPress publico...


The majestic wine Lesizza Gold 22k was born in the magical heart of the region called Goriška Brda, Slovenia, nestled halfway between the Alps and the Adriatic Sea. Its rolling hills, stretching from the emerald Soca River to Friuli in Italy, are dotted with houses and farms. The pleasant Mediterranean climate has created a perfect sanctuary for top-quality wines, luscious fruit and delectable olive oil. The wines of this fabulous region are present in the best restaurants in the world, thanks to its excellent quality.

Lesizza Gold 22k wine is produced by the biggest wine factory in Slovenia, founded in 1957 and one of the most recognized internationally for its many awards. Winemakers from Goriška Brda made the perfect formula so that taste of wine Lesizza Gold 22k is an exquisite and elegant pleasure.

Gold is a symbol of power, luxury and wealth. This precious metal is desired by its brilliance and value. Ancient cultures in addition of using gold for elaboration of the prodigious jewels and artifacts, believed that eating this wonderful metal would give them magical attributes, immortality, youth and fortune. Gold has been considered as a healing and beauty property.

The most prestigious dishes are adorned with gold and the most exclusive drinks are accompanied by this glamorous ingredient. It is a noble metal and its consumption is not harmful.

Lesizza Gold 22k wine, Chardonnay y Rose, is made with 22 karat edible gold.

We prepared many nice glamorous rewards for you!

1. EVENT LESIZZA GOLD 22K - 19.09.2015, at Villa Vipolže - Brda - Slovenia: www.vilavipolze.eu
100% zagotovljen dogodek ne glede na zbrana sredstva! Vabilo prejmete v septembru 1 teden pred dogodkom.
100% guaranteed event irrespective of the funds collected! Invitation we will send to you in September 1 week before the event.
100% evento garantito indipendentemente dai fondi raccolti! Invito sara inviato nel mese di settembre 1 settimana prima dell'evento.

PARTNERJI ZA PRENOČIŠČA (PARTNERS FOR ACCOMMODATION): Izkoristite 10% popust za rezervacije do 30.08.2015 - do zasedenosti prostih kapacitet  - obvestite partnerja, da prihajate na event LESIZZA GOLD 22K

     

       Češnjev_Gaj                     Valentinčič                    ZOI_Turizem

     

            Belica                        Hotel_Kozana                 San_Martin

OSTALI PARTNERJI (OTHER PARTNERS):

JOEL_LOYO_designs

    

            CASINO_FORTUNA                                  Juliana


With your valuable support we will achieve that the majestic wine Lesizza Gold 22k will become the special guest of the best moments and parties in your country. 

By supporting us in this project, we will get your confirmation that our product is appreciated and distributors will get a positive market signal.

We will use money to promote our wine Lesizza Gold 22k by making events, to visit and negotiate with distributors,  delivering samples and other correlated costs.

As described on rewards, this project will cover the first tour events located in USA: NYC, Las Vegas; MEXICO: Mexico City, Cancun; EU: Dobrovo - Slovenia.

More support we will get, more events we will make also in others countries.  

RISKS & CHALLENGES:

Lesizza Gold 22k wine is produced by the biggest wine factory in Slovenia, founded in 1957 and one of the most recognized internationally for its many awards, therefore we have a strong backup to assure that product is well produced and able to satisfy all customers needs.

By supporting us in this project, we will get your confirmation that our product is appreciated and distributors will get a positive market signal and so they will be ready to import and distribute our wine Lesizza Gold 22k.

Finally with money we will be able to lounch successfully marketing tour in first selected countries.

We have put lost of effort to develop our product, to research market and now it is your time to make it happen.

SPECIAL THANK YOU:

A special Thank you goes to our friend Dejan Pečenko for nice photos and to EURO-COM company for Limousine.

story:
Click to tweet about NeXT Stop

Last year $62 million was wasted on NYC MetroCards with remaining value.
The NeXT Stop Project recycles MetroCards with remaining value, combines them into full fares, then donates the rides to New Yorkers in need. We partner with outreach organizations like soup kitchens and vocational programs to effectively distribute the cards. We work with their staff to identify their clients who are seeking opportunity and trying to get to their 'next stop' in life. This process ensures proper MetroCard usage and enables us to quantify our impact. So far we have donated 1,103 round-trip MetroCards and 15 monthly cards, used for 250+ job interviews and 150+ medical appointments. 

  • So far we have relied on cash donations from family and friends to buy MetroCards for our Distribution Partners and we are proud of our progress to date. Still, we see the potential to do much more. 
  • Initially we hoped to partner with the MTA and place collection boxes in subway stations but our request was denied, so we have launched the MetroCard collection box initiative and are teaming up with local businesses for box placement. We are targeting strategic locations throughout New York City, especially those frequented by tourists (like hotels) since tourists often have leftover value on their MetroCards. 
--> We are counting on YOU to buy MetroCards for our Distribution Partners and produce collection boxes.

                                                  MetroCard Collection Boxes

         

                                          

                                            Flash Mob 12/20/2015 Performance:


What We Need & What You Get

  • Our goal is $10,000: half to donate another 1,000 MetroCards to our Distribution Partners and half to produce MetroCard collection boxes. We are a volunteer-based organization and all net proceeds go to the cause. 
  • Beyond the good karma of contributing to this worthy cause and helping unprivileged New Yorkers, you will also receive tangible satisfaction from our creative perks. In contributing, you have the opportunity to support not only our own efforts but those of local artists as well. We are partnering with local artists Carlos Pinto and Thomas McKean to bring you unique perks that embody our mission. Like NeXT Stop, these artists extract value from discarded MetroCards, elevating the hidden sparks within. Check out the calendar and original artwork!
                                                       (Metro)Card Holder

                    

                                      

The Impact

  • Your contributions would help New Yorkers get back on their feet. Your support offers them hope, encourages them to keep trying, and inspires them with the knowledge that someone out there wants them to succeed. Help them get to their NeXT Stop! Every MetroCard is another opportunity.
  • We have already had a big impact on people's lives over the past three years and with your help we can continue. Our donors will receive update emails with video testimonials from our Distribution Partners and MetroCard recipients. 

    We want to keep you in the loop and grow the NeXT Stop community because the real magic happens when we do good together.

  • Transportation is often overlooked relative to other vital resources like food, shelter, healthcare, education, and employment, but one must be able to access those resources and transportation is the missing link. And in a city so abundant in resources like New York, physical mobility is related to social mobility. We aim to shrink the opportunity gap by focusing our efforts on the transit deficit that plagues so many New Yorkers. 

  • Any amount we raise will be used to buy MetroCards and collection boxes. The more we raise, the greater the impact. 

Risks & Challenges.

  • It can be a challenge to get businesses to agree to house a collection box. Fortunately, we have already established a footprint and our boxes are all over Manhattan. We are making progress every day and working hard to collect more MetroCards.

  • With enough support from the community we can overcome even the largest obstacle and show the MTA it is in their best (PR) interest to support the cause.
  • For a proof of concept check out FareShare DC - they have had remarkable success with a similar program in Washington DC for over a decade.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Want to help us place MetroCard collection boxes all over NYC or interested in volunteering somehow? Contact us via this page or our website, we will bring you aboard the NeXT Stop train! 
  • Whether you are a one-time NYC tourist with a leftover MetroCard or a kindhearted New Yorker who wants to help their neighbor, please mail us your MetroCards: 115 Hartsdale Avenue, White Plains, NY 10606. Americans have mailed in cards from over 20 states around the country! Every mailed-in-MetroCard brightens our day and the generosity of NYC visitors is inspiring. Check out some examples in the photo gallery. 
  • Share with your network to spread the good word! 

                               Original MetroCard Artwork by Carlos Pinto

Help them get to their NeXT Stop! Every MetroCard is another opportunity.

We have already had a big impact on people's lives over the past three years and with your help we can continue. Our donors will receive update emails with video testimonials from our Distribution Partners and MetroCard recipients. We want to keep you in the loop and grow the NeXT Stop community because
the real magic happens when we do good together.



Transportation is often overlooked relative to other vital resources like food, shelter, healthcare, education, and employment, but one must be able to access those resources and transportation is the missing link. And in a city so abundant in resources like New York, physical mobility is related to social mobility. We aim to shrink the opportunity gap by focusing our efforts on the transit deficit that plagues so many New Yorkers. 
Any amount we raise will be used to buy MetroCards and collection boxes. The more we raise, the greater the impact.     Risks & Challenges.
  It can be a challenge to get businesses to agree to house a collection box. Fortunately, we have already established a footprint and our boxes are all over Manhattan. We are making progress every day and working hard to collect more MetroCards.



With enough support from the community we can overcome even the largest obstacle and show the MTA it is in their best (PR) interest to support the cause.
For a proof of concept check out FareShare DC - they have had remarkable success with a similar program in Washington DC for over a decade.


    Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:  Want to help us place MetroCard collection boxes all over NYC or interested in volunteering somehow? Contact us via this page or our website, we will bring you aboard the NeXT Stop train! 
Whether you are a one-time NYC tourist with a leftover MetroCard or a kindhearted New Yorker who wants to help their neighbor, please mail us your MetroCards: 115 Hartsdale Avenue, White Plains, NY 10606. Americans have mailed in cards from over 20 states around the country! Every mailed-in-MetroCard brightens our day and the generosity of NYC visitors is inspiring. Check out some examples in the photo gallery. 


Share with your network to spread the good word! 

                               Original MetroCard Artwork by Carlos Pinto

story:
Short Summary

Our Catholic Bookstore is more than just a retail business.  It is a place to gather, grow in the faith and pass the faith on to others.

We are the only store in the country known to deal in both new and used Catholic books.  We provide a respectful environment for people to sell used/pre-loved Catholic Books.  Our used books allow patrons to obtain good Catholic reading material at a significant discount.

Our store also offers traditional Catholic gifts and handcrafted jewelry, artwork, rosaries, crucifixes, cards and handbags.  We give local artists and craftsmen a place to sell their articles to the public.

We support monastic societies by offering items crafted by monks/sisters.  The purchase of these items supports their charitable work and religious orders.

Catholic Book Exchange opened almost 5 years ago against all odds.  The economy was struggling and Amazon and other online book and gift sellers were booming.

When we opened there was plenty of room on the bookshelves, and hot coffee samples brewed daily.  We have greatly expanded our selection of books and gifts since we opened and we have officially run out room.

We are faced with sharply increasing business expenses such as rent, utilities and insurance costs.  The only way for us to remain open is to expand our inventory and services in order to increase foot traffic and sales.

What we want to do to better serve you and our community:

  • Have a place where our customers and community can gather.
  • Provide timely access to the newest Catholic books, gifts and devotional items.
  • Help you find gifts and books that will nourish souls as well as entertain.
  • Host events like author book signings, children's story hour and book/bible study groups
  • Serve you a cup of amazing Mystic Monk Coffee and perhaps a something sweet.

 

What We Need

We have set our flexible goal at $35,000.

The direction we will go is driven by the amount raised in this campaign.  So your contributions are our compass.  We would love to GROW but that would be up to you!

In order to continue operating in our current space we will need to reformat the floor plan and streamline fixtures.  That is our STAY option.   If we raise $10,000 to $20,000 we will STAY in our current 1,000 sq ft space and redesign the layout and fixtures to better serve our community.  

How we will use the funds if we STAY:

  • $3,000 for new streamlined bookcases and floor displays.
  • $2,500 for wall display units and associated display fixtures.
  • $800-$1,000 to update lighting to improve merchandise visibility.
  • $1,000 -1,500 to cover operation expenses while closed to remodel.
  • $3,500 + for new inventory and expansion of available stock.

Our GROW option will include moving to a new, larger space.  We would like to upgrade to a space between 2,000 & 2,500 square feet.  If we raise $20,000 to $35,000 we will GROW.

How we will use the funds if we GROW:

  • $8,000 to initiate new lease and increased rent for larger property.
  • $4,500 for new shelves and fixtures.
  • $2,000 to cover initial impact of increased insurance and utilities for larger space.
  • $1,500 for new signage.
  •  $800 moving expenses.
  • $4,500 + increased inventory, selection and available stock.

If we do not reach our goal, all funds raised will go to improve the store and increase our selection of books and gifts to the best of our ability.

Finally, if we EXCEED our goal.....

All additional funds will be used to place a COFFEE SHOP in our store featuring Mystic Monk Coffee!

 

The Impact

As you may know, Catholic bookstores are few and far between.  Many of theses stores have had to close in the time we have been open.  These closings leave Catholic/Christian communities with large void.  It is our firm resolve to provide the Allen and the surrounding areas with a place to grow their faith with deep roots.

 

Risks & Challenges

Operating any small business comes with risk.  Although Catholic bookstores are a unique breed, we recognize the threat posed by online resellers.  It is promising to hear that the American Booksellers Association reports an increase in opening of independent bookstores. We fully understand that our customers are the most valuable ingredient.   Our challenge is to reach out to our customer base and bring them into the store.  We have plans to expand our reach using social media advertising, increased direct email access and an updated web presence.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that not everyone is able to contribute financially.  We would be honored if you could help us in other ways:

  • Help spread the word.  Use your social media, email and word of mouth to get our campaign out to as many people as possible.  
  • Try out Indiegogo share tools to get the word out.
  • Come visit us at the store and see what we have to offer.
  • Pray, pray and pray!

So, it's up to you...

Should we STAY or should we GROW now?

story:
ABOUT ME

My name is Mulewa Johychim from Uganda. I’m aged 23 (born 04/03/1993).

I’m in my last year at college. I’m pursuing a Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration – Majoring in Accounting. My college name is Bugema University (www.bugemauniv.ac.ug). I’ll be graduating in October. I’m the last child of eight children born to my parents. My parents are cultivators. None of my brothers and sisters got chance to reach college. Since I’m the last child, my parents sacrificed their belongings to meet my education requirements. They sold half of their land in the village so they could sponsor my studies.

BACKROUND OF THE BUSINESS IDEA

In Uganda, the rate of unemployment is so high. 90% of the youth above 24 years are unemployed. Getting a job here in Uganda is extremely hard. There is a lot of corruption and bribery in the employment system. After graduating from University, many youths are lured into bribing employers in promise of getting a job. Very many graduates end up not getting the jobs promised to them even after bribing the employers. Every year, tens of thousands of college graduates finish their studies. Majority of them don’t know where to start since the jobs are not there

Due to the above situation, I decided to do something. I want to start up my own business, become an entrepreneur, employ myself and when my business/firm grows and expands, I could employ many other youths.

TYPE OF BUSINESS

I want to start a Real Estate Business Firm on small scale. With time, I hope it will expand and grow into a big Real Estate Business. I have already made a survey and research about how and where I’m going to start the business.

Land appreciates in value on a monthly basis and the price of a piece of land will be much higher 6 months from now.

START UP CAPITAL BUDGET

I will start with one plot of land, with time, when my business firm expands; I will be dealing in both land and houses.

I need a minimum start-up amount of $2500, whereby;

1.  $1500 is to buy the Real Property (one plot of land). I will buy one plot of land in town (Kasese Town) at $1500. I will put some innovations on the piece of land/plot. The innovations include:

-  Creating a pathway connecting the piece of land to the main road

-  Extending a water line to the piece of land

-  Designing the land (portraying where a house, garden, etc could be set up)

After putting the above innovations, I would sell the plot of land at a much higher price to earn a profit which I would again reinvest in another bigger plot of land, put the above innovations and again sell it at a much higher price. This is possible since the price of land in a town increases in a very short time.

The plot of land which I will buy at $1500, would be sold at not less than $2000 in few months after putting the above innovations.

Land in a town appreciates in value on a monthly basis. So I’m certain my business will work out.

2.  $300 will cater rent for a small office which I would use as the center of operation. This amount would pay for rent of 6 months period.

3.  $700 will cater for innovation expenses ($500), registering the firm with the local government authority ($100), Publicizing and Marketing the Plot of Land ($100)

PUBLICITY AND MARKETING

-I plan to set up a small office and design a post to indicate the name of the firm.

-I will make a post written on " LAND FOR SALE" and put it on the piece of land.

-I will put announcements on a local radio to advertise the plot.

-I will upload pictures of the plot on social media to reach potential buyers. With time, I would design a website for the firm.

By doing the above, I would reach many potential buyers.

N.B, In Uganda here, the value of land in a town increases quickly. The price of a piece of land in a town here will be much higher after few months.

So I'm sure I will sell the plot of land at a higher price and earn good profit and then continue with the business of dealing in plots of land and houses.

I call upon everyone to help me achieve this dream. Donate any amount you can afford, however little it may be, donate it and I will make a big change. Share my campaign with your friends, relatives, workmates, and neighbors among others.

story:
Throughout the world, 34% of children grow up without fathers. More than 20 million children live in homes without the physical presence of a father. Millions more have dads who are physically present but emotionally absent. These absent and irresponsible fathers cause many of the current social problems. Children in fatherless homes are 5 times more likely to be poor when they grow up. They are more likely to experience educational, health, emotional problems, to be involved in crime and delinquency, to use drugs during their adolescence.

It doesn’t have to be that way!

We have launched for you “Ahavah” [meaning TO LOVE], a Tour and Lodge Business with a social mission for families!

 

Through a customized tour for family travelers, we want to empower family leaders (mostly fathers) to properly affirm, encourage and love their children during a customized tour for family travelers. At Ahavah, father’s affirmation and love are believed to be the KEY factor for a child to thrive in his future life.

 

Ahavah is more than just a great family vacation! It is a life changing one!

Support our “love” movement and make a positive change for the next generation!

Help us make a difference!

 

Please, feel free to contact us at randriannarindra@gmail.com and we will send you further details about the Ahavah experience, about its founder and how we are going to spend your money!
 

Narindra Randrianavony

Founder of Ahavah Tour & Lodge



Ahavah Beach Vacation in Madagascar:

 

Our Glamping experience in the rainforest of Madagascar:

(Photos credit: Rindra Ramasomanana, Tantely A. Rambatoson)

story:
We are Check The Waves! 

We are lifelong surfers and are very passionate about the ocean and measuring waves.  As all surfers do we have relied on forecasts and a scattering of NOAA buoys, mostly far offshore, to assist us in deciding when or where to surf and as we all know forecasts and distant buoy observations quite often don't match what we see when we get to the beach.  As a result our mission is to enhance the decision making capabilities of surfers, fishermen, boaters, engineers and the like by providing real-time information about the nearshore ocean conditions.

We currently have 4 wave buoys deployed off the east coast of Florida and the current data from these stations can be freely viewed on our website at https://www.checkthewaves.com.  The information our buoys provide is being used by water sports enthusiasts, coastal engineers, wave forecast modellers and academia to name a few.  Our immediate goal is to install a fifth nearshore real-time wave buoy off West Palm Beach in Palm Beach County to report the actual nearshore wave conditions for the benefit of anyone who does anything on the water. 

We are a for-profit company with a social good mission, in other words we are mission driven not profit driven.  We are looking for like minded individuals and businesses to support this mission and become part of our team!

 

We are seeking a total of $14,000 to manufacture and deploy buoy number 5.  We anticipate the costs to be as follows:

$3,500 - Estimated cost of perks, Indiegogo fees and payment processing fees.

$8,000 to build one full system including spares for wave gauge and data transmitter.

$2,500 for installation of anchor system and deployment of buoy, mainly boat rentals.

If we do not reach our goal the net money after perk costs and platform fees will be spent first on building buoy number 5.  What is left will go towards deployment and finally any remains will be spent on the spare equipment.

If we exceed our goal we will use the money in the following way:

  • We will begin to build another full system as a spare for the network.  This will enable us to react to buoy outages much quicker and cheaper.  If a buoy fails for whatever reason then without a spare we have to recover the buoy, repair it then re-deploy it which involves 2 boat trips as well as prolonged data outages.  If we have a spare system then we simply swap out buoys saving one boat trip and getting the data streaming again much quicker!
  • We will begin app development for a customizable surf alert that will be based on our real-time data.  We will be looking for beta testers once app development begins and preference will be given to registered users of Check The Waves.  So if you are interested in being a beta tester for our products or just want to be kept in the loop about news and developments go to https://www.checkthewaves.com and register!
  • More money = more buoys!  We currently have 8 permits for buoys in various parts of Florida and have used 4 so far.  While we will continue to install buoys based on our permits if you have a preferred location for a buoy and would like to fund the installation (buoy and deployment) we can easily obtain a permit and get it going.  If you do want to fund the entire installation of a buoy please contact us directly as it would be more financially efficient that way. 

 

Yes, your contribution will get you one of our cool perks!  But more importantly you become part of something big!  You're buying into the mission and a sense of community when you contribute and will forever become part of our team.  Data collection in this environment and on this scale are typically done by large academic institutions and the federal government but with the assistance of a community of like minded individuals and businesses we can disrupt the status quo and actually get more accomplished!  So is a T-shirt worth $50 or $100?  Maybe, maybe not but the reality is the T-shirt is merely a token of our gratitude for buying into the mission and the satisfaction that you're helping to make a difference in your world! 

 

Standard T-Shirt

 

Limited edition T-Shirt

         

 

Your contribution will help support the manufacture and deployment of our 5th wave buoy to be located off West Palm Beach in Palm Beach County.  This buoy will become the first nearshore real-time wave buoy ever located south of Martin County which is currently the location of the southern most nearshore real-time wave buoy off the East coast of Florida.  As with the other wave buoys this buoy will also provide critical decision making information to all maritime concerns.  

One of the more significant impacts is that we are entering a critically under-served section of Florida as described to us by several contacts inside the National Weather Service (NWS) and National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA).  We have been invited by these entities to join in a proposal to install up to 5 of our buoys in the Southeastern portion of Florida to provide this critical information directly to the NWS and NOAA which will be incorporated into their forecasting and warning products as well as ongoing research.  The problem is that these proposals typically take from 1 to 2 years to receive funding once submitted and there is no guarantee the project will be funded.  The need is there now and we are trying to fill that void one buoy at a time!

While small, another sign of validation that the information we provide is of high quality is that the local NWS office in Melbourne, FL has included a link to our website on their website for nearby observations.  This is by no means an endorsement of Check The Waves by the NWS it simply means that they view us as a credible outlet for accurate nearshore wave information.  Regardless we are stoked to have that link!   

 

                                        

Working in the ocean is inherently a risky, challenging and expensive endeavor.  The ocean relentlessly tests your equipment 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. 

One of the largest risks for our equipment are severe storms like hurricanes.  Recent Hurricane Matthew had the worst possible track for our current network of 4 buoys with the potential to take out the entire network in a 24 hour span.  Fortunately we only had one station suffer major damage, one minor damage and two unharmed.  Other risks include accidental boat strikes and vandalism, however to date we have not had any vandalism.  The initial version of the buoy was struck by a boat once but has since been redesigned to provide far more visibility and since then we have not had any boat strikes.

One of the biggest challenges we face are the logistics and expense of operation and maintenance.  While we try to do as much field work as possible by kayak sometimes the weather is not on our side and we have to find a suitable boat to hire to get us on the water especially for initial installation and any full recovery operation.  To date we have been very fortunate to have a network of people who have been willing to provide very low cost boat trips to help us out, and we greatly appreciate them!  However, since we strive for minimal down time for our buoys we sometimes have to hire a boat to get the data streaming again as quickly as possible and this can run $1000-$2000 depending on the location, so any realistic budget must include some cost for boat rental.

To mitigate the risks and challenges we have designed the whole system to be as inexpensive as possible while still providing high quality information to the end user.  This greatly eases the financial burden of replacement when buoys are lost or damaged for whatever reason.  They have also been designed to be small and light enough to be deployed by kayak once the anchor has been installed provided the conditions are flat enough to safely do so.  We can also perform basic repairs by kayak such as swapping out the wave gauge or data transmitter because they are modular and connectorized in waterproof housings.  

If you're stoked about our project and want to see more wave buoys in the water then please support us and grab one of our cool perks!

However, we totally understand if you are unable to contribute financially but if you are stoked to see our network grow then you can help us by spreading the word!  Blast us on all your favorite social media platforms, tell your friends and anyone else who will listen!

We currently have 4 wave buoys deployed off the east coast of Florida and the current data from these stations can be freely viewed on our website at https://www.checkthewaves.com.  The information our buoys provide is being used by water sports enthusiasts, coastal engineers, wave forecast modellers and academia to name a few.  Our immediate goal is to install a fifth nearshore real-time wave buoy off West Palm Beach in Palm Beach County to report the actual nearshore wave conditions for the benefit of anyone who does anything on the water. 

We are a for-profit company with a social good mission, in other words we are mission driven not profit driven.  We are looking for like minded individuals and businesses to support this mission and become part of our team!
 


We are seeking a total of $14,000 to manufacture and deploy buoy number 5.  We anticipate the costs to be as follows:
$3,500 - Estimated cost of perks, Indiegogo fees and payment processing fees.
$8,000 to build one full system including spares for wave gauge and data transmitter.
$2,500 for installation of anchor system and deployment of buoy, mainly boat rentals.
If we do not reach our goal the net money after perk costs and platform fees will be spent first on building buoy number 5.  What is left will go towards deployment and finally any remains will be spent on the spare equipment.
If we exceed our goal we will use the money in the following way:

We will begin to build another full system as a spare for the network.  This will enable us to react to buoy outages much quicker and cheaper.  If a buoy fails for whatever reason then without a spare we have to recover the buoy, repair it then re-deploy it which involves 2 boat trips as well as prolonged data outages.  If we have a spare system then we simply swap out buoys saving one boat trip and getting the data streaming again much quicker!
We will begin app development for a customizable surf alert that will be based on our real-time data.  We will be looking for beta testers once app development begins and preference will be given to registered users of Check The Waves.  So if you are interested in being a beta tester for our products or just want to be kept in the loop about news and developments go to https://www.checkthewaves.com and register!
More money = more buoys!  We currently have 8 permits for buoys in various parts of Florida and have used 4 so far.  While we will continue to install buoys based on our permits if you have a preferred location for a buoy and would like to fund the installation (buoy and deployment) we can easily obtain a permit and get it going.  If you do want to fund the entire installation of a buoy please contact us directly as it would be more financially efficient that way. 

 

Yes, your contribution will get you one of our cool perks!  But more importantly you become part of something big!  You're buying into the mission and a sense of community when you contribute and will forever become part of our team.  Data collection in this environment and on this scale are typically done by large academic institutions and the federal government but with the assistance of a community of like minded individuals and businesses we can disrupt the status quo and actually get more accomplished!  So is a T-shirt worth $50 or $100?  Maybe, maybe not but the reality is the T-shirt is merely a token of our gratitude for buying into the mission and the satisfaction that you're helping to make a difference in your world! 
 
Standard T-Shirt

 
Limited edition T-Shirt
          
 

Your contribution will help support the manufacture and deployment of our 5th wave buoy to be located off West Palm Beach in Palm Beach County.  This buoy will become the first nearshore real-time wave buoy ever located south of Martin County which is currently the location of the southern most nearshore real-time wave buoy off the East coast of Florida.  As with the other wave buoys this buoy will also provide critical decision making information to all maritime concerns.  
One of the more significant impacts is that we are entering a critically under-served section of Florida as described to us by several contacts inside the National Weather Service (NWS) and National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA).  We have been invited by these entities to join in a proposal to install up to 5 of our buoys in the Southeastern portion of Florida to provide this critical information directly to the NWS and NOAA which will be incorporated into their forecasting and warning products as well as ongoing research.  The problem is that these proposals typically take from 1 to 2 years to receive funding once submitted and there is no guarantee the project will be funded.  The need is there now and we are trying to fill that void one buoy at a time!
While small, another sign of validation that the information we provide is of high quality is that the local NWS office in Melbourne, FL has included a link to our website on their website for nearby observations.  This is by no means an endorsement of Check The Waves by the NWS it simply means that they view us as a credible outlet for accurate nearshore wave information.  Regardless we are stoked to have that link!   
 
                                        
Working in the ocean is inherently a risky, challenging and expensive endeavor.  The ocean relentlessly tests your equipment 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. 
One of the largest risks for our equipment are severe storms like hurricanes.  Recent Hurricane Matthew had the worst possible track for our current network of 4 buoys with the potential to take out the entire network in a 24 hour span.  Fortunately we only had one station suffer major damage, one minor damage and two unharmed.  Other risks include accidental boat strikes and vandalism, however to date we have not had any vandalism.  The initial version of the buoy was struck by a boat once but has since been redesigned to provide far more visibility and since then we have not had any boat strikes.
One of the biggest challenges we face are the logistics and expense of operation and maintenance.  While we try to do as much field work as possible by kayak sometimes the weather is not on our side and we have to find a suitable boat to hire to get us on the water especially for initial installation and any full recovery operation.  To date we have been very fortunate to have a network of people who have been willing to provide very low cost boat trips to help us out, and we greatly appreciate them!  However, since we strive for minimal down time for our buoys we sometimes have to hire a boat to get the data streaming again as quickly as possible and this can run $1000-$2000 depending on the location, so any realistic budget must include some cost for boat rental.
To mitigate the risks and challenges we have designed the whole system to be as inexpensive as possible while still providing high quality information to the end user.  This greatly eases the financial burden of replacement when buoys are lost or damaged for whatever reason.  They have also been designed to be small and light enough to be deployed by kayak once the anchor has been installed provided the conditions are flat enough to safely do so.  We can also perform basic repairs by kayak such as swapping out the wave gauge or data transmitter because they are modular and connectorized in waterproof housings.  


If you're stoked about our project and want to see more wave buoys in the water then please support us and grab one of our cool perks!
However, we totally understand if you are unable to contribute financially but if you are stoked to see our network grow then you can help us by spreading the word!  Blast us on all your favorite social media platforms, tell your friends and anyone else who will listen!

story:
Short Summary

My name is jamie i am a 23 year old self employed individual i am currently part of a development team that is working on our very own cryptocurrency we have been working hard since 2013 when we launched the coin .

the reason behind our campaign is we require additional funds so that we can drastically bring our code base up to date that which will cost a fair amount of cash something i am lacking i have put as much funds into the project that i can same with other members of the development team and we also require the funds to finish work on some of our other projects that can be used with the cryptocurrency.

if we raise the required amount of funds we will be able to have work completed asap removing out all the old code a replacing it with newer code and we can then begin focus on additional services we have that we are sure will make this the crypto currency of the future.

What We Need & What You Get

We Require $5000 in funding for the following list of work below also every single person who donates can receive a set amount of the digital currency we have held in the community wallet we hold about 10% of the current supply of the coins.

  • codebase update costing about $1000
  • marketing costing about $2000
  • services costings $2000 this will be used on a multitude of services 


About incakoin

INCAKOIN. Creating a SAFE and EVIROMENTLY sound future for the children of the world 


Many newcomers and some of the early adopters might be asking themselves “Why INCAKOIN? Whats so special about incakoin?”….. Well I’ll tell you.

1.) Early adoption.

INCAKOIN is rounding post beta. INCAKOIN’S dev’s have worked out the bugs. INCA survived a 51% attack which we are very proud of doing. Checkpoint servers have been installed. What this means is even IF incakoin were to experience a 51% attack developers can rewind the blockchain ( The platform in which carries out transactions on the network. ) back to the time of attack and recommence mining right before the time of the attack. A fix for the malleability issue bitcoin has been facing. CRUCIAL due to the rouge nature of data mining. The server acts as a SAFEGUARD so that no one group or entity can control the blockchain or all the coin supply. This is a very good thing and is unique to INCAKOIN.. The Proof of Stake give’s INCA the ability to verify transactions and new coin creation with older mature coins. Another fix for the transaction malleability exploit facing previous forms of CryptoCurrencies. Genius if you ask me. Good work DEV’s. Most SECURE CryptoCurrency. Making us MORE secure than Bitcoin by LIGHT YEARS 

2.) Fair supply

We came into the game with the question “Why would 21 Million of something be fair for a GLOBAL economy?” Answer: It wouldn’t. Bitcoin is not a fairly distributed currency. 21 million units divisible by how ever many times it can be divided will still NOT be fairly distributed currency. Especially with Bitcoin early adopters holding many of the coins already. Its like saying “I have money because I’m SMARTER than you. I had INVESTED when you didn’t know and I didn’t bother to TELL YOU because it was INSIDE information”…. If this was Wall Street bitcoin would be Enron. Its unforgivable. INCAKOIN however is very transparent about its activities. We feel as though that withholding information about us or how we operate is not something we are willing to do. That’s why we remain transparent. Keeps us honest. 190 million mined INCA coins are a very reasonable number as far as supply of  digital gold. This number better reflects the worlds supply of gold if we choose for it to be the basis of our backing. The network is setup for rapid growth and hashrate. So jump right in and mine with us. You’ll make a FORTUNE 

3.) Because we CARE 

We care about the world and people. INCAKOIN is friendly to the environment. With our model of mining we use way less electricity and we do so with pride. Being a Hybrid Proof of Stake and Proof of Work coin enables us to use way less electricity than the BEAST that Bitcoin has become. It is our obligation as responsible adults to create a future that we would want our children and our children’s children to grow up in when we are gone. To do anything else would be SELFISH! We encourage everyone who mines INCAKOIN to be as eco friendly as possible. Solar, Wind, and Water powered energy if you have the means.

On that note that’s what make us special. INCAKOIN is advanced and a hybrid of CryptoCurrency. We have the fix already in place that Bitcoin lacks concerning transaction malleability. We are the future and the future is made of INCA gold.

https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=933851.0

http://incakoin.info

https://www.facebook.com/iNKAcoin/

https://twitter.com/Incakoin1

story:
Why Support Wizhunt?


Together We Can Revolutionize Marketing and Advertising, and Help Millions of Businesses and Consumers Save




                                         Facts

Fact #1: The Cost of Business Marketing and Advertising Negatively Impacts the Cost The Consumer Ends Up Paying. (Simply Put, The Business Spends More the Customer Pays More). 

Fact #2: Mega Coupon Companies Are Pocketing an Average of 50% of Each Customer Purchase; This is Why They Ask for Your Credit Card. This is Not Cool!

Fact #3: Until Now Businesses Have Been Forced to Either Forfeit an Average of 50% of Their Sales Revenue, Utilize a Cost Per-Click Method or Pay for Expensive Monthly Coupon Mailers. 

Fact #4: The Wizhunt Platform Provides Businesses a Wide Array of Innovative Tools to Empower The Business vs Profiting Off Of Business or Their Customers.

Fact #5: The Wizhunt Tools Are Amazingly Powerful and Can Save the Business Both a Tremendous Amount of Time and Money.


The Wizhunt Solution 


Wizhunt in a Nutshell:                 

  Create Deals - Sell  Virtually Anything 

  Promote Your Local Business, Online Store, Website, eBay store,                  Amazon Store, MLM, IGG, KS, MLM, blog and Virtually Anything etc.

  The Wizhunt Platform Provides the Ability to Quickly Edit, Customize and  Optimize Deals, Discounts, Free Estimates and Free Consultations.

  Quickly Implement Customizable Call to Action

  Sync up to 50 Social Profiles on Facebook and Twitter

  Set up Social Media Auto-Posting Campaign in Seconds to Post for              Months

  Stop Tagging & Setup Cross Marketing for Your Deals. Why You Might Ask? Number 1, Tagging is Not Effective in Marketing According to the Rule of 7.  Number 2, Your Social Network Limits Your Exposure Even Within Your Own Network. Solution: Crowdsource Your Social Media and Expand Your Social Reach and Influence. You Are No Longer Limited to Just Your Current Social Network. Now Your Deals Can Post Automatically on Your Friends Connected Accounts Enabling You the Ability to Target Other Networks You Did Not Have Access To. Expand Your Reach! Yes, Your Friends Can Also Control Which Deals Post and How Often. Yes, You Can See Who is Connected, Which Platform, Total Friends/Follows, How Many Posts Remain etc.

 

  Update Your Wizhunt Followers With New Deals Automatically Via                Email   

  We do not Pocket a Percentage of Each Customer Purchase.

  No Cost Per-Click

  Keep Your Hard-Earned Money

  Create Deals, Discounts, and Coupons in Minutes

  Add in Click to Call, Pictures, Youtube Videos, and Maps

  Free Website - Business Listing

  Track Analytics

  Get Ratings and Reviews


  


How it Works

Wizhunt is an evolutionary tool that helps you create deals, coupons, discounts, and advertisements that posts to your network of friends, family, and followers by using Facebook and Twitter. Wizhunt posts to your social media profiles and alternates your deals automatically. Wizhunt automatically generates hashtags and keywords to help the advertisement gain added exposure in public timelines and can be setup in seconds.



Creating Deals, Discounts & Social Posting


  The Wizhunt platform provides online and local businesses, and anyone               with the ability to quickly edit, customize, and optimize deals,                                     discounts and offers.

  Quickly drop in functions such as Click to Call, Hours of Operation,                           Pictures, Youtube Videos, and Maps.  

  Select your call to action and send customers to your online store, website           or local business.

  When customers click on the deal on Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus,                     Tumblr, or Pinterest, they are taken directly to the deal.

  Set deals to post automatically in seconds on social media.

  Save a tremendous amount of time using Wizhunt's social media                             autoposting tools.

  Autopost deals, content, pictures, videos and updates.


Suggested Hashtags & Social Media Autofill



Social Media Autoposting Tools and Capabilities 



Wizhunt is Less Expensive, Faster and Safer 


  We don’t take a percentage of any of your deals.

  No cost per-click

  No monthly fees

  Cancel anytime hassle free

  Flat rate pricing for the year

  Purchase services as you go.

  Create deals in minutes

  Our social media autoposting is much faster than anything on the market.

  Social autoposting pulls pictures from your advertisements automatically.

 Can post to all connected social profiles by platform instantly, individually and simultaneously.

 Wizhunt advertisements have a customizable pre-selected call to action. Saves time and improves efficiency on social media.


Social Media Autoposting in 17 Seconds




Verify Deals in Seconds 



Why Indiegogo


Well simply Indiegogo is best method for us to get the word out to the public and for us to raise funds. The Indiegogo community is supportive and engaged. Our small team created this innovative concept which eliminates the middleman and takes deals directly from business to the consumer. Over the past few years, we have perfected our model and added more powerful tools. As a supporter, you will receive our service at a fraction of the retail price while helping us improve our platform and enhance our development process. 


Goals 


Your financial support of our project will address four of our goals in a timelier manner than we are currently able. We need to employ a Graphic UI/UX designer. We need to recruit another MVC.NET developer to help refine and update our product. We need a place of business to conduct our daily operations. Your support will enable us to complete development of our mobile apps on iOS and Android, and ramp up our ability to polish our product and take it to market with momentum. 

 Better UI/UX and Graphics

 Another Part-Time MVC.NET Developer

 Office to Conduct Our Business 


                                   

Scott Hunt is the owner, founder, and CEO of Wizhunt. Mr. Hunt has worked as a consultant and designed analytics, defined KPIs, and developed onboarding strategies for social media messaging apps that have been featured by MacWorld, Geekwire, MIT, CNBC, and others. He found that giant coupon websites were forcing businesses to reduce the cost of their products or services by 20% - 30% and pocketing 50% of the remaining transaction, leaving the businesses with 20% of the remaining revenue. Mr. Hunt performed market research and found that small to medium size businesses, both online and local, were forced to either use coupon websites that pocket 50% of each customer purchase, cost per-click methods, or costly coupon mailers. 


Fulfillment Plan


Upon completion of our Indiegogo campaign promotion codes will be disbursed and operational on or before September 30th. On a link at the bottom of Wizhunt Locals homepage contributors will be able to find their names. The link will go to: https://www.wizhuntlocals.com/Indiegogo/aug/2016

Your FREE business website will be available immediately after sign up.


Challenges 


The primary challenge of our Indiegogo will be to create a clear understanding in a wide customer base that our services offer a substantially larger savings than mega coupon companies and any other advertising solution. The secondary challenge is to create the public realization that Wizhunt tools can be used in an unlimited variety of businesses ventures such as real estate, automotive, Indiegogo campaigns, online stores, and local business, etc. Indiegogo will be to create a clear understanding that our business tools are multifaceted and can save both time and money. The challenges of our Indiegogo will be getting the word out and convincing users to participate, share, and adopt Wizhunt's opportunity. Thank You

Victoria Advocate Press Release
https://www.victoriaadvocate.com/news/2013/oct/16/wizhunt_am_10xx13_222486/


We Sincerely Appreciate Any Size Donation. Thank You!


Automated Social Media Marketing for DEALS and Coupons

story:
Come one, come all to celebrate the Fourth of July in true Federal Hill style! This year we are going online once again to help fund the parade and street party, in addition to the support from our generous sponsors. No donation is too small - or too big!

As usual, we will gather on the 800 block of William Street at 10 am on Monday, July 4th, 2016. The parade itself will depart at 10:30 and everyone is invited to march in it! Decorate your bike, stroller, or wagon. New this year: a patriotic hat contest! And stay afterwards for the National Anthem, a hoola-hoop contest, water balloon toss, and limbo.

Our goal is to cover the cost of the parade and party including the Fort McHenry Fife & Drum Corps, hoola-hoopers, a stilt walker, balloon animals, and Miss Twist ice cream. Thank you for your help!

Questions? Please contact Clare_Lentz at yahoo.com.

story:
Who We Are

  • Hello! We are Himalayan Mushroom Firm. My name is Tika Ram Aryal, I am a botany professor at Tribuvhan University here in Pokhara, Nepal. From my passion and curiosity for mycology I started a small culture lab out of my home 13 years ago to practice mycelium culture propagation and seed spawn creation. My small project has turned quite the operation!
  • Himalayan Mushroom Firm mushroom spawn and culture lab is the main provider of mushroom seed spawn in Western Nepal. We are unique because we are the only seed spawn lab in Nepal that creates mushroom seeds from pure cultures. This method helps the mushrooms become more resistant to disease and resilient to local environmental conditions. Himalayan Mushroom Firm provides seeds to farmers across 30 western districts of Nepal and we currently operate out of my home! Because space is limited it is difficult to achieve and maintain laboratory standards of cleanliness. The demand for seed is growing quickly and we have outgrown our current operation.
  • Once funded the lab will be able to produce more spawn, provide support and education opportunities to mushroom farmers, produce higher quality spawn, and preserve new varieties of cultivable mushrooms. Our lab will help support more mushroom farmers across Nepal and preserve a diverse array of mushroom varieties.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $25,000 to achieve our goal.
  • The full cost of lab renovations and new equipment is $40,000. We have received $15,000 from the Agricultural Ministry Department of Nepal for the equipment and now we need the remaining $25,000 for building renovations, first two years rent, and shelving.
  •  This money will be used to cover the first two years of rent on our new space and to outfit and renovate the lab to the highest sanitary conditions. This includes: new tile flooring, fresh paint, stainless steel tables and racks, plumbing, lighting, and an air conditioning unit.
  • Even if we don’t reach our goal, thanks to Indiegogo’s flexible funding, any amount we raise will be put toward our expansion. We are ready to expand, and are able to consolidate needs to get off the ground.
  • We have a range of perks available including: a shout out on our facebook page, name your own mushroom being grown in Nepal, a complete Oyster Mushroom Toolkit all about oyster mushroom growing from seed to harvest, a HMF T-shirt (swag), your name on a plaque in our the main office (this can also be your company’s name or logo), or a room in our new lab named after you!

The Why

  • We believe this is important because though only the size of Tennessee, Nepal is home to 30 million people. 70% of these people, make their income from agricultural work as subsistence farmers, meaning they must farm to make ends meet and also to feed their families. Because much of Nepal’s arable land lies on steep slopes and marginalized areas Nepali’s struggle to produce enough food. Rates of malnutrition, stunting, and anemia are staggeringly high within Nepal’s population, especially with women, young mothers, and children under five.
  • According to the WHO over 40% of children under the age of five suffer from stunting, 11% of children suffer from wasting and 29% are underweight.      
  • Because of these issues the farmers of Nepal have turned to high value and specialty crops such as mushrooms to meet both the need for income generation and personal nutrition. Mushroom farming is desirable because it has low production cost, high market value and easy to grow from agricultural waste products. Mushrooms are also a good source of protein and vitamins.
  • Only two types of mushrooms exist in Nepal for cultivation: Oyster and Shiitake. While these are nutritious and easy to grow diversity in a system begets resilience. To help ensure that mushroom farmers can mitigate risks of crop failure from climate change and other environmental factors.
  • This campaign is to help us expand to continue to meet the ever-growing demand as well as include an educational and a seed bank element. 

Risks & Challenges

  • Himalayan Mushroom Firm is an existing and successful business. We have been creating and selling mushroom spawn for 13 years.
  • We have a long-standing relationship with the Nepal’s Ministry of Agriculture Department and have a wide spread reputation among mushroom farmers for having the best and most reliable source of seed spawn.
  • Our biggest challenge as of yet is rent on our new intended space. Because we cannot afford to buy or build a brand new facility we plan to rent out a space for 10 years as we build and save enough for a permanent location. Our rent contract has a policy of increasing the monthly cost by 15% every two years.
  • Rent combined with the need to purchase new equipment has made it extremely difficult to expand in the past. However, this campaign will give us the capacity for expansion.
  • Again, Even if we don’t reach our goal, thanks to Indiegogo’s flexibile funding, any amount we raise will be put toward our expansion. We are ready to expand, and are able to consolidate needs to get off the ground and open as soon as possible. The sooner we open the new lab the sooner we can begin to sell seed spawn and continue to build the business.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that there are those of you who would love to contribute but can’t right now. That’s all right! Spreading the word about our campaign is free and is as helpful as a money donation. Indiegogo makes it easy to give us a shout out with th

story:
Here We Go

My name is Benjamin Woodard and I am the owner of Woodard Rod Company. I started fly fishing at the age of 12 in Texas with my dad. We snuck around the Middle Bosque River nailing bass and brim. Fast forward several years and I am sitting at a coffee shop in Arkadelphia, Arkansas where I have lived for the past 3 years. I have been wrapping rods since my teens, and been a trout guide since I moved up here. 

I am sitting in this coffee shop writing out this dang thing for the 3rd time now. This campaign is my dream, and it is a dream that can succeed, and is on the verge of just that. I am that guy that does not stop moving and thinking about how I could make things better or how I can make a good impact. This rod company, I'm pretty sure, will make quite the positive impact. Bringing a chrisitan based rod company home, to make beautiful, quality, affordable, unique rods in a community that is as obsessed about trout as me. That is the dream. And I wouldn't be here writing this if it was not for my Family, my brothers Kyle, Chase, Beau, B-Ball, Stephen, and Jake.

By helping me achieve this dream, You will be supporting a company that will be producing quality USA made fly fishing rods, that will cost no more than $400 dollars. That is something no other company is doing. Major companies are asking $800-1200 dollars for a rod made in the USA. I pledge to also make a higher quality product. Basically, you are supporting a  better product, USA Made, and half the cost.

How can I do this? you'll just have to wait and see. Or order one of my rods already out in hands, and see for yourself.

 

What We Need & What You Get

So. $18,256. That is the exact number we need to get everything off the ground. I am talking 300 blanks (100 of each rod series), corks, reel seats, eyelets, guides, tip tops, tootsie rolls, handtools, drying racks, graphics, some marketing through facebook and AdWords, some fan gear for our backers,  and 12 wrapping machines. We are choosing the best of the best, and not sacrificing quality for the sake of cutting costs. I decided to just make them in my apartment, to cut out the cost of opening a store front or shop. 

 

What Do You Get?

A Dang sweet USA Made Fly Rod, a shirt or hat, some crazy cool stickers, and maybe a trip for two the Little Red river on a guided expedition for those sweet pigs, guided by me, Benjamin Woodard.

Risks & Challenges

First of all, the challenge with projects is always money or time, and in this case it is both. Making a fly rod takes a lot of time, and I've already succumbed to the idea of 24 hour work days. But money is the real issue here, and to bring production of a rod to the USA is a costly manor, and every little penny helps.

Quality in the rod business is a major risk. Blanks are usually rolled graphite, and imperfections in blanks are more common than should be. Fortunately, I have been wrapping rods since I was 17, and I am more than qualified to produce a quality fly rod.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help us.

We need to get the word out, in every way possible. For every share, you are entered to win a  free rod. Sharing on all platforms is encouraged, but we are on Facebook and Instagram. Winner will be announced at the end of the project. 

 

 

That's all I wrote. thank you for your time, and feel free to email me at Woodardrodco@gmail.com with any questions or concerns. God Bless.
