story:
Who We Are?

W-MKT.com is a global full digital marketing consultancy which specializes in LinkedIn authority branding, positioning and publishing solutions, as well as in automation tools for entrepreneurs and businesses worldwide.

Over the years, the company has managed to successfully develop and grow over 350 niche websites in more than 40 fields with a total monthly audience of over 25,000,000 active readers . Our social media fans count is over 5,000,000 spread on various social media platform like Facebook, Twitter and Pinterest.

For the past 7 years, the company has consulted hundreds of what so-called "influencers", global leaders and companies to better position themselves and companies in the largest business network in the world - LinkedIn.

The Product

Our LinkedIn Auto Messaging Software was born out of the rapidly growing interest of businesses for LinkedIn automation tools.

Our product is a break-through technology that allows businesses and individuals like marketers, public speakers, entrepreneurs to effectively generate new leads and instantly drive more sales.

What's the different between our software and all the software on the market?

Compared to all other LinkedIn software available on the market, our software actually generates you money. None of the current software on the web can offer you that!

LinkedIn Autopilot tells you they will increase your LinkedIn Profile rank. So what? If this ranking doesn't bring you money on the table, what's the point of using it on a monthly basis?

Why for LinkedIn?

With over 384,000,000 users LinkedIn is the largest business network in the world. 

More than 80% of the LinkedIn members are considered key decision makers compared to Facebook.

Compared to other social networks, members on LinkedIn have more trust in the professional information they receive on LinkedIn – 82% for LinkedIn compared to 28% and 23% for Twitter and Facebook!

Bottom line: When you are using LinkedIn, you are dealing strictly with high-caliber professionals willing to connect and do business with you.

LinkedIn is the largest business network in the world. Its publishing platform – Pulse is becoming more and more popular among managers, executives, entrepreneurs, marketers, public speakers, and businesses. The idea of becoming an “Influencer” and getting your post seen by millions of business and recruitment oriented audience becomes more lucrative.

Our Linkedin Auto Messaging software has 2 essential functions to fully automated your leads generation needs:

1) Message to Group Members: Allows you to send direct message to each group member (with subject and body) to ALL members of selected groups automatically.* - Limited messages due to LinkedIn policies changes
2) Message to all your contacts/connections (no limitations to the number of daily messages that you can send!)

See for yourself how it works:

Features:

* Personalized messages (replaces [FIRST_NAME] by actual name)
* Ability to Pause/Resume from last stopped point ( may be aborted by user, or by unexpected errors like browser crash)
* Simulates user interactions automatically (to avoid getting blocked by Linkedin)
* Customizable Delay + Random variation = Delay between each message sending
* Creates Logs/Reports of each message sent.
* Doesn’t disturb normal browsing activities
* Elegant Design

Recent updates 
-Ability to save messages(subject and body templates) into list.
-Ability to start from given page and member index

Requirements:

* Google Chrome Browser
* Any OS with chrome installed

Software FAQ and specifications

1. How Do I Make Money Using Your Software?

It's really simple. Whether you use the software for personal purposes or you have a sales team, you can use your/their accounts and build your network and get in touch with your relevant audience. Once you've built your network you can now start approaching your leads. We give you the tools(the software) and it's up to you how effectively you will use it. If you are not good at sales or marketing, hire a specialist to write you messages and test them out.

The software has been tested on tens of accounts generating instant results and respectively revenue. 

2. I have heard that LinkedIn limits the number of messages that could be sent to group members. Is this software capable of overcome that?

Yes! After spending years on research and development, we have found a way which allows you to send unlimited number of messages to any group members. Even if you get “You are no longer authorized to message to this member” message, the software can send message without any problem. So you don’t have to worry about that.

*Hot Tip: Keep the count below 50-100 per day.

3. Does it work on Mac OS

Yes, it works on any OS that supports Google Chrome browser. It is a Google chrome extension ( which is not available on Google Play store).

What Do We Need and Why Are Why Promoting This Product through Indiegogo?

The product was launched at the beginning of August and we believe that more businesses should know about it. This is your great opportunity to automate your sales and online revenue at a very special early bird price!

Why do we need $500 only and how will this money be spent?

So far we invested over $35,000 in the development of the product. We would like to compliment our existing and new clients(you) with new features and better user friendly interface. 

  • The money will be spent towards the development of new features and the development of the current features and for fixing any bugs and/or new restrictions that LinkedIn may place for sending messages.

What is in for you?

  • Early access to our LinkedIn automation software + a lifetime LinkedIn Automation Software support & updates membership on our website w-mkt.com Cost of the perk: $250 (normal price on w-mkt.com is $700!)

  • Sponsored Twitter & Facebook Shoutouts to total of 5 million fans spread on several viral Facebook and Twitter pages in exchange of your support!
See some of our accounts:

  • Marketing tools membership on our website(paid 1 year in advance - normal monthly subscription price: $199). Learn more about our subscription levels and what is in for you using this perk, please click here. 

What is your LinkedIn Influencer Programme all about?

LinkedIn is the largest business network in the world. Its publishing platform – Pulse is becoming more and more popular among managers, executives, entrepreneurs, marketers, public speakers, and businesses. The idea of becoming an “Influencer” and getting your post seen by millions of business and recruitment oriented audience becomes more lucrative.

Why?

Because it gives once in a lifetime opportunity to change your life, drive millions in sales, position yourself and business as a leader on the market, connect to investors, potential partners, get a new job, or hire a talent for your company!

Our programme will help you to reach your goals. We don’t and can’t say that it is easy to become influential, but with hard work, plus our help, and your dedication, we can do miracles! Our programme requires a dedication and a contract with us for at least 6 months. This way, we can assure that you get the best traction and results within your goals, deadlines and ideas.

This service is not cheap, but if you are on this page, you clearly understand its value – money don’t buy everything. The unlimited opportunities that will come to you can’t be measured. We will guide you and be helping you all the way to reaching your business goals.

FAQ:

Q: Why should I choose you?

A: After 7 years of successfully consulting and positioning entrepreneurs, executives, marketing gurus, public speakers, and businesses, we have a proven track of positioning and authority branding individuals. We currently run 10 LinkedIn marketing websites. We partner with a number of reputation management firms in the United States and the United Kingdom.

Q: Who should participate in this programme?

A: This programme is perfect for individuals and businesses planning to build authority branding, drive more traffic to their websites; individuals who want to generate more leads, get new business opportunities, and drive more sales.

Q: Why your program lasts for 6 months?

A: Millions of people and businesses are now realizing the power of LinkedIn Pulse and what is the added value that Pulse brings them to the table: new business opportunities, more revenue, higher rankings in Google, Yahoo and Bing searches. What most of them don’t realize or understand is how to become popular on Pulse and how to increase your ROI by using it. Well, we specialize in just that.

We have the blueprint and we are here to help you. Our programme lasts for 6 months because our experience clearly shows that getting to the influencer status and getting your Pulse articles picked by LinkedIn takes time, dedication, and money investment. However, the results are invaluable!

Q: If I apply for your program and pass the full programme, what’s next for me?

A: This is not the end for you. We will be here for you and we will help you to continue to maintain and develop your public status on LinkedIn. This is how we build strong business relations based on trust, results, and transparency.

Q: How does the payment work?

A: All of our Programme Plans require 1-time payment. After you complete the payment, we will get in touch with you within 1-2 Business Days with more details on how to start.

Q:Why do you ask for so much money in advance? Can’t I just pay on month-to-month basis?

A: Our programme requires dedication, time, and energy. We believe that if we are committed to work with you and provide the best possible outcome for you, the programme won’t work for you for only 1 month. Best results come within the first 3 to 6 months. Please feel more than welcome to try our Free Trial service*.

What happens after I order any of your perks?

1) If you chose to pay with Paypal:
  • We will be able to complete and/or deliver all the perks at the beginning of November, 2015 after Indiegogo clears the payments.
Optional: If you don't want to wait until the beginning of November, 2015, we can also deliver all perks instantly, but you will have to get in touch with us at info@kaaso.com to settle the payment and discuss your requirements(depending on the perk you choose eg. Influencer Programme, etc.)

2) If you chose to pay with your credit/debit card:

  • We will be able to complete and/or deliver all the perks at the beginning of January, 2016 after Indiegogo clears the payments.
Optional: If you don't want to wait until the beginning of November, 2015, we can also deliver all perks instantly, but you will have to get in touch with us at info@kaaso.com to settle the payment and discuss your requirements(depending on the perk you choose eg. Influencer Programme, etc.)

Risks & Challenges

We have already made the big step investing time and over $35,000 in this project. It's time to make it full available to the business world. We won't be able to make it without your support. 

Testimonies from happy clients about our consultancy work and software:

Other Ways You Can Help

We thank you for your support. New risks and challenges will pop up throughout this project. Our next step is to continue developing our existing product and find new clients among the way.

Once you've built your network you can now start approaching your leads. We give you the tools(the software) and it's up to you how effectively you will use it. If you are not good at sales or marketing, hire a specialist to write you messages and test them out.The software has been tested on tens of accounts generating instant results and respectively revenue. 2. I have heard that LinkedIn limits the number of messages that could be sent to group members. Is this software capable of overcome that?Yes! After spending years on research and development, we have found a way which allows you to send unlimited number of messages to any group members. Even if you get “You are no longer authorized to message to this member” message, the software can send message without any problem. So you don’t have to worry about that.*Hot Tip: Keep the count below 50-100 per day.3. Does it work on Mac OSYes, it works on any OS that supports Google Chrome browser. It is a Google chrome extension ( which is not available on Google Play store).What Do We Need and Why Are Why Promoting This Product through Indiegogo?The product was launched at the beginning of August and we believe that more businesses should know about it. This is your great opportunity to automate your sales and online revenue at a very special early bird price!Why do we need $500 only and how will this money be spent?So far we invested over $35,000 in the development of the product. We would like to compliment our existing and new clients(you) with new features and better user friendly interface. 
The money will be spent towards the development of new features and the development of the current features and for fixing any bugs and/or new restrictions that LinkedIn may place for sending messages.
What is in for you?Early access to our LinkedIn automation software + a lifetime LinkedIn Automation Software support & updates membership on our website w-mkt.com Cost of the perk: $250 (normal price on w-mkt.com is $700!)

Sponsored Twitter & Facebook Shoutouts to total of 5 million fans spread on several viral Facebook and Twitter pages in exchange of your support!

See some of our accounts:


Marketing tools membership on our website(paid 1 year in advance - normal monthly subscription price: $199). Learn more about our subscription levels and what is in for you using this perk, please click here. 
What is your LinkedIn Influencer Programme all about?

LinkedIn is the largest business network in the world. Its publishing platform – Pulse is becoming more and more popular among managers, executives, entrepreneurs, marketers, public speakers, and businesses. The idea of becoming an “Influencer” and getting your post seen by millions of business and recruitment oriented audience becomes more lucrative.
Why?
Because it gives once in a lifetime opportunity to change your life, drive millions in sales, position yourself and business as a leader on the market, connect to investors, potential partners, get a new job, or hire a talent for your company!
Our programme will help you to reach your goals. We don’t and can’t say that it is easy to become influential, but with hard work, plus our help, and your dedication, we can do miracles! Our programme requires a dedication and a contract with us for at least 6 months. This way, we can assure that you get the best traction and results within your goals, deadlines and ideas.
This service is not cheap, but if you are on this page, you clearly understand its value – money don’t buy everything. The unlimited opportunities that will come to you can’t be measured. We will guide you and be helping you all the way to reaching your business goals.
FAQ:
Q: Why should I choose you?
A: After 7 years of successfully consulting and positioning entrepreneurs, executives, marketing gurus, public speakers, and businesses, we have a proven track of positioning and authority branding individuals. We currently run 10 LinkedIn marketing websites. We partner with a number of reputation management firms in the United States and the United Kingdom.
Q: Who should participate in this programme?
A: This programme is perfect for individuals and businesses planning to build authority branding, drive more traffic to their websites; individuals who want to generate more leads, get new business opportunities, and drive more sales.
Q: Why your program lasts for 6 months?
A: Millions of people and businesses are now realizing the power of LinkedIn Pulse and what is the added value that Pulse brings them to the table: new business opportunities, more revenue, higher rankings in Google, Yahoo and Bing searches. What most of them don’t realize or understand is how to become popular on Pulse and how to increase your ROI by using it. Well, we specialize in just that.
We have the blueprint and we are here to help you. Our programme lasts for 6 months because our experience clearly shows that getting to the influencer status and getting your Pulse articles picked by LinkedIn takes time, dedication, and money investment. However, the results are invaluable!
Q: If I apply for your program and pass the full programme, what’s next for me?
A: This is not the end for you. We will be here for you and we will help you to continue to maintain and develop your public status on LinkedIn. This is how we build strong business relations based on trust, results, and transparency.
Q: How does the payment work?
A: All of our Programme Plans require 1-time payment. After you complete the payment, we will get in touch with you within 1-2 Business Days with more details on how to start.
Q:Why do you ask for so much money in advance? Can’t I just pay on month-to-month basis?
A: Our programme requires dedication, time, and energy. We believe that if we are committed to work with you and provide the best possible outcome for you, the programme won’t work for you for only 1 month. Best results come within the first 3 to 6 months. Please feel more than welcome to try our Free Trial service*.

What happens after I order any of your perks?
1) If you chose to pay with Paypal:We will be able to complete and/or deliver all the perks at the beginning of November, 2015 after Indiegogo clears the payments.

Optional: If you don't want to wait until the beginning of November, 2015, we can also deliver all perks instantly, but you will have to get in touch with us at info@kaaso.com to settle the payment and discuss your requirements(depending on the perk you choose eg. Influencer Programme, etc.)2) If you chose to pay with your credit/debit card:

We will be able to complete and/or deliver all the perks at the beginning of January, 2016 after Indiegogo clears the payments.
Optional: If you don't want to wait until the beginning of November, 2015, we can also deliver all perks instantly, but you will have to get in touch with us at info@kaaso.com to settle the payment and discuss your requirements(depending on the perk you choose eg. Influencer Programme, etc.)



Risks & Challenges
We have already made the big step investing time and over $35,000 in this project. It's time to make it full available to the business world. We won't be able to make it without your support. 
Testimonies from happy clients about our consultancy work and software:


Other Ways You Can HelpWe thank you for your support. New risks and challenges will pop up throughout this project. Our next step is to continue developing our existing product and find new clients among the way.

story:
The story for WTSQ starts in 2015...

Charleston’s independent community radio station started operating with a mission to bring a breath of fresh air to the radio waves. In the years since, WTSQ has become well known for its anniversary parties and member mixers, hosting local and national musical acts in non-traditional settings. WTSQ has also hosted live broadcasts of Charleston’s summer live music series, Live on the Levee every year. Over the last half a decade, the station has grown into a central part of the creative community in Charleston, curating a unique mix of music and personalities that give a local voice in a medium that has come to be dominated by national interests or out of state corporate media empires. WTSQ lives and breathes Charleston, and that’s how we like it!
 

Pandemic Rock

Like most everyone else, we’ve been significantly impacted by the Covid-19 pandemic. Not only did we have to quarantine our studios, but we also saw a lot of our opportunities for funding dry up. Since March, we’ve been relying almost entirely on our sustaining members.

Through it all, keeping your favorite hosts on the air was our priority. By modifying existing technology at the station, Founder & President Chris Long developed a process that enabled DJs to broadcast from home. Thanks to this, since the start of the lockdown, WTSQ has been one of the only Charleston radio stations that has continuously broadcast live content. We do this because we know it matters to our listeners. Especially in these difficult last few months, we understand how important it is to have something consistent. If we can help it, we’re not going anywhere.
 

Become a part of WTSQ.

July 10th - 17th is our 2020 Annual Fund Drive - during this time we want to raise $12,000. That money goes directly to our operating costs - everything from rent, utilities, music licensing, and web hosting, to microphones, computers, and cables. Moreover, during the pandemic response, we have relied on a number of technologies in order to keep broadcasting live content and a homemade listening experience to you. All of this together isn’t a huge amount of money, especially when compared to the quality and quantity of what we create with it. Yet, simply put, we cannot do it without the support we're asking for.
 

What do you get when you give?

Donating to WTSQ supports the arts and enriches your community. Community radio provides a creative outlet and platform for area artists, as well as regional and touring acts. We are the only local radio station that plays WV artists every single day. Supporting WTSQ makes the town you live in a better place to live because it has a great radio station. WTSQ keeps you informed of events happening in your hometown.

Supporting WTSQ keeps Josh Gaffin’s Afternoon Show on the air. Josh has been coming to you weekdays since the station started - even during a pandemic. Gaffin provides basic news headlines and a specially curated mix that combines new wave and indie with just a hint of classic rock, soul and reggae. Amazing DJs like Mya Ross keep you up-to-date with the best new music from the best artists in the world. There are nearly 40 other shows that are broadcast weekly on WTSQ. All of this is offered free of charge to you, on 88.1 FM, streaming, or on our app. Listen all day if you want :)

There’s always something new or an old favorite coming up next. WTSQ is also your home for independent, progressive perspectives on the news of the day. We bring you Democracy Now! every weekday morning in the 8 o’clock and 9 o’clock hours because we know you want and need a fresh take on the news in the frankly insane world we live in these days. Our own Mountain State Update with Dan Heyman is also meant to offer a progressive take on local news. None of this is available from any other local source.

WTSQ exists because we believe that local community radio makes Charleston and the Kanawha Valley a better place to be. Your support makes it possible, now more than ever!

In-Studio with Mike Puskin - host of Sit N' Spin

2019 Christmas Parade

Radio Smut on-air late nights in Charleston on 88.1 FM


Charleston's The Company Stores with Casey Litz live in the WTSQ Blue Room


Michael Grass, Mick Wiseman, & Michael Earley slinging merch at Artwalk


Josh Gaffin, Rick Skeen, & Robbie "Eman" Erby broadcasting live from Capitol Market 2019


Phil Melick (PhonOmelet), John Lilly (Honky Tonk Holiday), & Rick Skeen (Cruising the Boulevard) part of WTSQ's Sunday lineup


Huntington, WV's Of The Dell performing during the 1st WTSQ Anniversary Party 2016


Roger Young, John Seabolt, & Erica Simanek volunteering their livers for WTSQ


Rolling the footage all the way back to the beginning - 2015 WTSQ Launch Party @ Blvd Tavern


WTSQ Volunteer Meeting in Green Room


WTSQ Crew downtown Charleston dancing in the streets


WTSQ superfans Paula & Frank!


WTSQ internal & extended family - Josh Beane, Harley Wince, Cousin Nicky


WTSQ Halloween - blue room turns red


FestivALL & Mt Stage friends paying a visit


WTSQ officially lands on the 8th floor @ Union Building 2015


Heather Johnson & Kenny Lavender representing WTSQ @ Bourbon & Beyond


Higgins & Earley - 5 years of volunteering @ WTSQ ! ! ! ! !


Ian Bode/WTSQ group art project during WTSQ member mixer


Mya Ross & Mike Wiseman providing live coverage of Live on the Levee


WTSQ crew together downtown cooling off @ Sam's


Tom Sloan, Erica Simanek, & Heather Johnson - WTSQ crew downtown @ Levee


Johnny Conqueroo performing at Tricky Fish - WTSQ 2019 Fall Member Mixer


WTSQ Green Room wall o' posters


Ray Whiting, Michael Earley, Robbie Erby, Carrie Kirk, Rob James, Josh Beane, Steven Allen Adams, Scotty Johnson, Mya Ross, Dan Taylor, John Seabolt, Heather Johnson, Rick Skeen, Lora Reynolds, Roger Young, Mike Wiseman, Brittany McComas - 2020 video shoot for WTSQ

story:
ΕΛ - Όταν ξεκινήσαμε αυτή τη μονάδα, υλοποιούσαμε ένα από τα μεγαλύτερα όνειρά μας. Πλέον, πρόκειται για ένα όραμα για την παραγωγή φρέσκων προϊόντων, τη διατήρηση της γης και την έμπνευση για μια νέα γενιά αγροτών, σε μια χώρα που αγωνίζεται να ξεφύγει από την οικονομική κρίση. Με τη βοήθεια και την υποστήριξή σας μπορούμε να τα καταφέρουμε!

Για την ελληνική έκδοση της υπόλοιπης ιστορίας μας, παρακαλούμε μεταβείτε στο κάτω μέρος της σελίδας.

FarmFresh Hellas history

Here at FarmFresh Hellas we operate a small scale hydroponic greenhouse operation that was originally founded in 2009 by an ambitious and experienced Greek agronomist and farmer and his best friend. The company operated under a Greek name and was meant to deliver high quality vegetables for the local markets in Greece. Located in the heart of Greece, close to the stunning rock formations and monasteries of Meteora, with a mild, Mediterranean climate, clean and ample water and power supplies, as well as a perfect road infrastructure to the main cities Athens and Thessaloniki, the project was on a good road to success. The two partners took entrepreneurial risk at a time when Europe was struck by a deep economic crisis and Greek in particular went into an economic tailspin, that brought the country close to bankruptcy.

The farming project of the two partners started off well and after building the greenhouses and the state-of-the-art climate control systems, the production commenced and first harvests were sold. However, the deepening economic crisis in Greece, tax increases for the agricultural sector and skyrocketing unemployment let prices for vegetables and fruits fall significantly. Increasingly cheap and low-quality imports from Turkey and Northers Africa hit all farmers in Greece but the game-changing event for our farmers came in the form of a severe late spring thunderstorm that did not only destroy the greenhouses but wiped out the whole production of the year. Since this moment, the farm operated in a state of emergency, barely surviving with very low scale production.

The situation changed in 2015, when the farmers met a foreign idealist, who was fascinated by the idea of high-quality hydroponic vegetable production. They drafted a plan to revive the farm and ramp up production. Producing and selling high-quality, healthy, nutritious and savory vegetables and lettuce was just one part of the plan. Greece is still in crisis mode with capital controls in place since more than 2 years and unemployment still above 20%. So, the plan was also to create employment opportunities for local people and help the local community to pull themselves out of the dire economic situation.

FarmFresh Hellas was established in January 2016 and it took over the farming operations. Investors’ money helped to finance the first and most important repairs of the greenhouses and farming premises. Step after step, the farm improved and production started again.


FarmFresh Hellas today

FarmFresh is in its second year of production now. All greenhouses enjoyed the most urgent repair works and currently we are in the middle of the peak harvest season. FarmFresh focuses on the production of tomatoes, green and colored peppers, chili peppers, lettuce and herbs. We are using hydroponic cultivation methods. These methods allow us to save up to 80% of water compared to traditional farming, making farming more sustainable. Hydroponics also allows to exactly tailor the combination and amount of fertilizer used for the plants, thus avoiding over-fertilization of soil. Hydroponics operate in a closed-circuit system, i.e. fertilizers are not dumped on the soil but re-used in a circulatory system. This way, we make farming more sustainable. 

The flip-side of Hydroponics is, that we will never get an “organic”-certificate because in almost all countries worldwide, organic certificates are only granted to traditional farmers. FarmFresh produces premium quality, healthy and nutritious vegetables without use of pesticides or herbicides. In our modern greenhouses our plants don’t easily develop and spread diseases, which makes the use of herbicides unnecessary. Greenhouse farming allows full climate-control throughout the year, i.e. we can create the climate that our plants need to enable best growth and perfect harvest results.

How do we use the funds?

FarmFresh started its production in 2016 and will have a first full year of production in 2017. We have invested lots of money, hard work and sweat to bring the greenhouses back to production. The most urgent repairs have been done, but more improvements need to be done.

The greenhouses plastic film for the other two greenhouses needs to be replaced. This is important for protecting our plants and production and to preserve energy during winter time. These old films might not hold another storm or severe wind which will bring us back to where we started. 

The old pumps, a critical part of our production systems, need to be replaced. Our plants need their water and nutrients continuously and these pumps have done this for a long time. We repaired them, but now they have to be replaced by new plastic ones that will not errode. 

Our old forklift, that used to load pallets full of produce on the trucks delivering them to the market, is now almost dead. We have a plan to restore it, and we need it before new harvesting season starts. 

Furthermore, we have an outside nethouse area, that needs to be repaired. We also need to do investments in the packaging and the logistics process, with necessary repairs of the warehouse, the old truck and the cooling storage still waiting.

Why this project is important

As we mentioned above, Greece is still in economic crisis and FarmFresh wants to be an example of how investments in this beautiful country can create change. Domestic investments by local companies are crucial to create employment opportunities especially for the young people (youth unemployment rate in Greece is around 40%) and local production of healthy and high-quality food should help to balance the cheap and low-quality imports from other countries and offer a healthy food alternative to the Greek people. Finally, sustainable (hydroponic) farming concepts should contribute to the environment, water conservation and the reduction of fertilizer use. 

Our project is not risk-free

Like other entrepreneurial activities, this project is not risk-free. Our major risk factors are:

  • Very adverse weather conditions, leading to significantly reduced harvest yields.
  • Pests or diseases in the greenhouses.
  • Lack of skilled workers.
  • Low sales prices for a longer period of time (e.g. due to low-quality imports).
  • Change in consumer preferences.

How you can help us without a financial contribution

If you are excited about our farming operations but cannot help us financially, there are many other ways to support us:

  • Like us on Facebook
  • Follow us on Instagram
  • Visit our website www.farmfresh-hellas.com
  • Share our updates and latest developments with your family and friends.
  • Contact us and help us increasing our network.

Η ιστορία της FarmFresh Ελλάς 

Η FarmFresh Ελλάς διαχειρίζεται μία μικρής κλίμακας υδροπονική, θερμοκηπιακή εγκατάσταση, που ιδρύθηκε αρχικά το 2009 από έναν φιλόδοξο και έμπειρο Έλληνα γεωπόνο και τον καλύτερό του φίλο και συνεργάτη. Η εταιρεία λειτουργούσε κάτω από ελληνική επωνυμία και είχε ως στόχο την παραγωγή υψηλής ποιότητας λαχανικών για την ελληνική αγορά. Τοποθετημένο στην καρδιά της Ελλάδας, κοντά στους επιβλητικούς σχηματισμούς και τα μοναστήρια των Μετεώρων, με ένα ήπιο, μεσογειακό κλίμα, καθαρά και μεγάλα αποθέματα νερού και ενέργειας, καθώς και άριστες οδικές υποδομές προς τις μεγαλύτερες ελληνικές πόλεις, της Αθήνας και της Θεσσαλονίκης, το έργο ήταν στον σωστό δρόμο προς την επιτυχία. Οι δύο συνέταιροι ανέλαβαν τον επιχειρηματικό κίνδυνο σε μια εποχή που η Ευρώπη χτυπήθηκε από μια βαθιά οικονομική κρίση, και ιδίως η Ελλάδα που βρέθηκε σε μια οικονομική δίνη, φέρνοντας την χώρα στα πρόθυρα της πτώχευσης.

Το επιχειρηματικό εγχείρημα των δύο συνεταίρων ξεκίνησε ομαλά και μετά την ολοκλήρωση της κατασκευής των θερμοκηπίων και την εγκατάσταση συστημάτων ελέγχου κλίματος και παραγωγής τελευταίας τεχνολογίας, η παραγωγή ξεκίνησε. Ωστόσο, η επιδείνωση της οικονομικής κρίσης στην Ελλάδα σε συνδυασμό με την αύξηση της φορολογίας στον αγροτικό τομέα και την εκτίναξη της ανεργίας, προκάλεσε την πτώση των τιμών στα φρούτα και τα λαχανικά. Τα όλο και περισσότερα φθηνά και χαμηλής ποιότητας εισαγόμενα προϊόντα από την Τουρκία και την Βόρειο Αφρική έπληξαν το σύνολο των παραγωγών στην Ελλάδα. Αλλά το κυριότερο πλήγμα για την επιχείρηση εκδηλώθηκε με τη μορφή μιας σφοδρής καταιγίδας που όχι μόνο κατέστρεψε τα θερμοκήπια, αλλά αφάνισε το σύνολο της τρέχουσας παραγωγής. Από εκείνη τη στιγμή, η μονάδα λειτουργεί σε κατάσταση έκτακτης ανάγκης, και επιβιώνει μόλις και μετά βίας, με μια πολύ μικρής κλίμακας παραγωγή.

Η κατάσταση άλλαξε το 2015, όταν οι δύο παραγωγοί συνάντησαν έναν ξένο ιδεαλιστή, ο οποίος γοητευμένος από την ιδέα της παραγωγής λαχανικών υψηλής ποιότητας μέσω της τεχνικής της υδροπονικής καλλιέργειας αποφασίζει να συνεργαστεί μαζί τους προκειμένου να αναβιώσει το αγρόκτημα και να επανέλθει η παραγωγή. Οι τρεις πλέον συνεργάτες, αποφασίζουν να συντάξουν ένα σχέδιο βασισμένο, τόσο στην παραγωγή και προώθηση υψηλής ποιότητας θρεπτικών λαχανικών όσο και στην δημιουργία ευκαιριών απασχόλησης για την τοπική κοινότητα, την στιγμή που η Ελλάδα εξακολουθεί να βρίσκεται σε κατάσταση κρίσης με τους ελέγχους κεφαλαίων να ισχύουν περισσότερο από 2 χρόνια και την ανεργία να υπερβαίνει το 20%.  

Η FarmFresh Hellas ιδρύθηκε τον Ιανουάριο του 2016 αναλαμβάνοντας την γεωργική εκμετάλλευση. Η χρηματοδότηση των επενδυτών βοήθησε να πραγματοποιηθούν οι αρχικές και πιο σημαντικές επισκευές και συντηρήσεις στα θερμοκήπια και στις λοιπές εγκαταστάσεις. Βήμα βήμα, το αγρόκτημα βελτιώθηκε και η παραγωγή ξεκίνησε και πάλι.

Η FarmFresh Ελλάς σήμερα

Σήμερα η FarmFresh βρίσκεται στο δεύτερο έτος παραγωγής της. Όλα τα θερμοκήπια δέχονται τις πιο επείγουσες εργασίες επισκευής και αυτή τη στιγμή διανύει στο τέλος της καλλιεργητικής περιόδου. Η FarmFresh επικεντρώνεται στην παραγωγή τομάτας, πράσινων και έγχρωμων πιπεριών, πιπεριών τσίλι, μαρουλιού και αρωματικών φυτών, χρησιμοποιώντας υδροπονική μέθοδο καλλιέργειας. Η μέθοδος αυτή μας επιτρέπει να εξοικονομούμε έως και 80% του νερού σε σύγκριση με την παραδοσιακή γεωργία, καθιστώντας την παραγωγή βιώσιμη. Η υδροπονία μας επιτρέπει επιπλέον να προσαρμόσουμε ακριβώς το συνδυασμό και την απαιτούμενη ποσότητα σε θρεπτικά στοιχεία για τα φυτά, αποφεύγοντας έτσι την άσκοπη λίπανση του εδάφους. Στην υδροπονία λειτουργεί σύστημα κλειστού κυκλώματος, δηλαδή τα λιπάσματα δεν εναποτίθενται επί του εδάφους αλλά επαναχρησιμοποιούνται σε ένα κλειστό σύστημα. Με αυτόν τον τρόπο, η γεωργία καθίσταται βιώσιμη και φιλική προς το περιβάλλον.

Η Farmfresh παράγει υψηλής ποιότητας, υγιεινά και θρεπτικά λαχανικά με μηδενική χρήση φυτοφαρμάκων ή ζιζανιοκτόνων. Στα φυτά των σύγχρονων θερμοκηπίων μας δεν είναι εύκολο να εμφανιστούν και να εξαπλωθούν ασθένειες, γεγονός που καθιστά τη χρήση ζιζανιοκτόνων περιττή. Η γεωργία θερμοκηπίου επιτρέπει πλήρη έλεγχο κλίματος όλο το χρόνο, δηλαδή μπορούμε να δημιουργήσουμε το κλίμα που τα φυτά μας χρειάζονται για την καλύτερη ανάπτυξη και επιθυμητά αποτελέσματα κατά τη συγκομιδή.

Πώς θα χρησιμοποιήσουμε την χρηματοδότηση

Η FarmFresh ξεκίνησε την παραγωγή της το 2016 και το πρώτο πλήρες παραγωγικό έτος θα ολοκληρωθεί το 2017. Έχουμε επενδύσει πολλά χρήματα, σκληρή δουλειά και ιδρώτα για να επαναφέρουμε τα θερμοκήπια σε παραγωγικό επίπεδο. Οι πιο άμεσες και αναγκαίες επισκευές έχουν ολοκληρωθεί, αλλά πρέπει να γίνουν ακόμη περισσότερες βελτιώσεις. Τα θερμοκήπια χρειάζονται επιπλέον εργασίες επισκευής (αντικατάσταση των φιλμ κάλυψης και κυψελών ψύξης). Επιπλέον, έχουμε μια εξωτερική περιοχή καλυμμένη με δίκτυ, που πρέπει να επισκευαστεί. Πρέπει, επίσης, να γίνουν επενδύσεις στη συσκευασία και στις υπηρεσίες εφοδιασμού, με αναγκαίες επισκευές στην αποθήκη, στο παλιό φορτηγό, στο ψυγείο και το κλαρκ που βρίσκονται σε αναμονή.

Γιατί το έργο αυτό είναι σημαντικό

Όπως αναφέραμε παραπάνω, η Ελλάδα εξακολουθεί να βρίσκεται σε οικονομική κρίση και η Farmfresh θέλει να είναι ένα παράδειγμα για το πώς οι επενδύσεις σε αυτή την όμορφη χώρα μπορεί να φέρουν την αλλαγή. Οι εγχώριες επενδύσεις από τις τοπικές επιχειρήσεις είναι ζωτικής σημασίας για τη δημιουργία ευκαιριών απασχόλησης, ιδίως για τους νέους (ποσοστό ανεργίας των νέων στην Ελλάδα είναι περίπου 40%). Επιπλέον, η τοπική παραγωγή υγιεινών και υψηλής ποιότητας τροφίμων θα πρέπει να συμβάλει στην εξισορρόπηση των φθηνών και συνάμα χαμηλής ποιότητας εισαγόμενων από άλλες χώρες και να προσφέρουν μια υγιή εναλλακτική λύση διατροφής. Τέλος, η ιδέα της βιώσιμης (υδροπονικής) γεωργίας πρέπει να συμβάλει στη διασφάλιση του  περιβάλλοντος, την εξοικονόμηση νερού και τη μείωση της χρήσης λιπασμάτων.

Το εγχείρημά μας ενέχει ρίσκο

Όπως και άλλες επιχειρηματικές δραστηριότητες, το εγχείρημα αυτό δεν είναι χωρίς κινδύνους. Σημαντικοί παράγοντες κινδύνου είναι:    
●    Πολύ δυσμενείς καιρικές συνθήκες, που μειώνουν σημαντικά τις αποδόσεις.
●    Παράσιτα ή ασθένειες στα θερμοκήπια.
●    Έλλειψη εξειδικευμένου προσωπικού.
●    Χαμηλές τιμές πώλησης για μακρό χρονικό διάστημα (π.χ. λόγω εισαγόμενων προϊόντων).
●    Αλλαγή στις προτιμήσεις των καταναλωτών.

Πώς μπορείτε να μας βοηθήσετε χωρίς οικονομική συνεισφορά

Εάν είστε ενθουσιασμένοι με τις αγροτικές δραστηριότητές μας, αλλά δεν μπορείτε να μας βοηθήσετε οικονομικά, υπάρχουν πολλοί άλλοι τρόποι για να μας υποστηρίξετε:    
●    Like στο Facebook
●    Ακολουθήστε μας στο Instagram
●    Επισκεφθείτε την ιστοσελίδα μας www.farmfresh-hellas.com
●    Διαδώστε τα νέα μας και τις τελευταίες εξελίξεις στην οικογένεια και στους φίλους σας.
●    Επικοινωνήστε μαζί μας και βοηθήστε μας να αναπτύξουμε το δίκτυό μας.
story_txt:
ΕΛ - Όταν ξεκινήσαμε αυτή τη μονάδα, υλοποιούσαμε ένα από τα μεγαλύτερα όνειρά μας. Πλέον, πρόκειται για ένα όραμα για την παραγωγή φρέσκων προϊόντων, τη διατήρηση της γης και την έμπνευση για μια νέα γενιά αγροτών, σε μια χώρα που αγωνίζεται να ξεφύγει από την οικονομική κρίση. Με τη βοήθεια και την υποστήριξή σας μπορούμε να τα καταφέρουμε!Για την ελληνική έκδοση της υπόλοιπης ιστορίας μας, παρακαλούμε μεταβείτε στο κάτω μέρος της σελίδας.FarmFresh Hellas historyHere at FarmFresh Hellas we operate a small scale hydroponic greenhouse operation that was originally founded in 2009 by an ambitious and experienced Greek agronomist and farmer and his best friend. The company operated under a Greek name and was meant to deliver high quality vegetables for the local markets in Greece. Located in the heart of Greece, close to the stunning rock formations and monasteries of Meteora, with a mild, Mediterranean climate, clean and ample water and power supplies, as well as a perfect road infrastructure to the main cities Athens and Thessaloniki, the project was on a good road to success. The two partners took entrepreneurial risk at a time when Europe was struck by a deep economic crisis and Greek in particular went into an economic tailspin, that brought the country close to bankruptcy.The farming project of the two partners started off well and after building the greenhouses and the state-of-the-art climate control systems, the production commenced and first harvests were sold. However, the deepening economic crisis in Greece, tax increases for the agricultural sector and skyrocketing unemployment let prices for vegetables and fruits fall significantly. Increasingly cheap and low-quality imports from Turkey and Northers Africa hit all farmers in Greece but the game-changing event for our farmers came in the form of a severe late spring thunderstorm that did not only destroy the greenhouses but wiped out the whole production of the year. Since this moment, the farm operated in a state of emergency, barely surviving with very low scale production.The situation changed in 2015, when the farmers met a foreign idealist, who was fascinated by the idea of high-quality hydroponic vegetable production. They drafted a plan to revive the farm and ramp up production. Producing and selling high-quality, healthy, nutritious and savory vegetables and lettuce was just one part of the plan. Greece is still in crisis mode with capital controls in place since more than 2 years and unemployment still above 20%. So, the plan was also to create employment opportunities for local people and help the local community to pull themselves out of the dire economic situation.FarmFresh Hellas was established in January 2016 and it took over the farming operations. Investors’ money helped to finance the first and most important repairs of the greenhouses and farming premises. Step after step, the farm improved and production started again.
FarmFresh Hellas todayFarmFresh is in its second year of production now. All greenhouses enjoyed the most urgent repair works and currently we are in the middle of the peak harvest season. FarmFresh focuses on the production of tomatoes, green and colored peppers, chili peppers, lettuce and herbs. We are using hydroponic cultivation methods. These methods allow us to save up to 80% of water compared to traditional farming, making farming more sustainable. Hydroponics also allows to exactly tailor the combination and amount of fertilizer used for the plants, thus avoiding over-fertilization of soil. Hydroponics operate in a closed-circuit system, i.e. fertilizers are not dumped on the soil but re-used in a circulatory system. This way, we make farming more sustainable. The flip-side of Hydroponics is, that we will never get an “organic”-certificate because in almost all countries worldwide, organic certificates are only granted to traditional farmers. FarmFresh produces premium quality, healthy and nutritious vegetables without use of pesticides or herbicides. In our modern greenhouses our plants don’t easily develop and spread diseases, which makes the use of herbicides unnecessary. Greenhouse farming allows full climate-control throughout the year, i.e. we can create the climate that our plants need to enable best growth and perfect harvest results.How do we use the funds?FarmFresh started its production in 2016 and will have a first full year of production in 2017. We have invested lots of money, hard work and sweat to bring the greenhouses back to production. The most urgent repairs have been done, but more improvements need to be done.The greenhouses plastic film for the other two greenhouses needs to be replaced. This is important for protecting our plants and production and to preserve energy during winter time. These old films might not hold another storm or severe wind which will bring us back to where we started. The old pumps, a critical part of our production systems, need to be replaced. Our plants need their water and nutrients continuously and these pumps have done this for a long time. We repaired them, but now they have to be replaced by new plastic ones that will not errode. Our old forklift, that used to load pallets full of produce on the trucks delivering them to the market, is now almost dead. We have a plan to restore it, and we need it before new harvesting season starts. Furthermore, we have an outside nethouse area, that needs to be repaired. We also need to do investments in the packaging and the logistics process, with necessary repairs of the warehouse, the old truck and the cooling storage still waiting.Why this project is importantAs we mentioned above, Greece is still in economic crisis and FarmFresh wants to be an example of how investments in this beautiful country can create change. Domestic investments by local companies are crucial to create employment opportunities especially for the young people (youth unemployment rate in Greece is around 40%) and local production of healthy and high-quality food should help to balance the cheap and low-quality imports from other countries and offer a healthy food alternative to the Greek people. Finally, sustainable (hydroponic) farming concepts should contribute to the environment, water conservation and the reduction of fertilizer use. Our project is not risk-freeLike other entrepreneurial activities, this project is not risk-free. Our major risk factors are:
Very adverse weather conditions, leading to significantly reduced harvest yields.
Pests or diseases in the greenhouses.
Lack of skilled workers.
Low sales prices for a longer period of time (e.g. due to low-quality imports).
Change in consumer preferences.
How you can help us without a financial contributionIf you are excited about our farming operations but cannot help us financially, there are many other ways to support us:
Like us on Facebook

Follow us on Instagram

Visit our website www.farmfresh-hellas.com

Share our updates and latest developments with your family and friends.
Contact us and help us increasing our network.
Η ιστορία της FarmFresh Ελλάς Η FarmFresh Ελλάς διαχειρίζεται μία μικρής κλίμακας υδροπονική, θερμοκηπιακή εγκατάσταση, που ιδρύθηκε αρχικά το 2009 από έναν φιλόδοξο και έμπειρο Έλληνα γεωπόνο και τον καλύτερό του φίλο και συνεργάτη. Η εταιρεία λειτουργούσε κάτω από ελληνική επωνυμία και είχε ως στόχο την παραγωγή υψηλής ποιότητας λαχανικών για την ελληνική αγορά. Τοποθετημένο στην καρδιά της Ελλάδας, κοντά στους επιβλητικούς σχηματισμούς και τα μοναστήρια των Μετεώρων, με ένα ήπιο, μεσογειακό κλίμα, καθαρά και μεγάλα αποθέματα νερού και ενέργειας, καθώς και άριστες οδικές υποδομές προς τις μεγαλύτερες ελληνικές πόλεις, της Αθήνας και της Θεσσαλονίκης, το έργο ήταν στον σωστό δρόμο προς την επιτυχία. Οι δύο συνέταιροι ανέλαβαν τον επιχειρηματικό κίνδυνο σε μια εποχή που η Ευρώπη χτυπήθηκε από μια βαθιά οικονομική κρίση, και ιδίως η Ελλάδα που βρέθηκε σε μια οικονομική δίνη, φέρνοντας την χώρα στα πρόθυρα της πτώχευσης.Το επιχειρηματικό εγχείρημα των δύο συνεταίρων ξεκίνησε ομαλά και μετά την ολοκλήρωση της κατασκευής των θερμοκηπίων και την εγκατάσταση συστημάτων ελέγχου κλίματος και παραγωγής τελευταίας τεχνολογίας, η παραγωγή ξεκίνησε. Ωστόσο, η επιδείνωση της οικονομικής κρίσης στην Ελλάδα σε συνδυασμό με την αύξηση της φορολογίας στον αγροτικό τομέα και την εκτίναξη της ανεργίας, προκάλεσε την πτώση των τιμών στα φρούτα και τα λαχανικά. Τα όλο και περισσότερα φθηνά και χαμηλής ποιότητας εισαγόμενα προϊόντα από την Τουρκία και την Βόρειο Αφρική έπληξαν το σύνολο των παραγωγών στην Ελλάδα. Αλλά το κυριότερο πλήγμα για την επιχείρηση εκδηλώθηκε με τη μορφή μιας σφοδρής καταιγίδας που όχι μόνο κατέστρεψε τα θερμοκήπια, αλλά αφάνισε το σύνολο της τρέχουσας παραγωγής. Από εκείνη τη στιγμή, η μονάδα λειτουργεί σε κατάσταση έκτακτης ανάγκης, και επιβιώνει μόλις και μετά βίας, με μια πολύ μικρής κλίμακας παραγωγή.Η κατάσταση άλλαξε το 2015, όταν οι δύο παραγωγοί συνάντησαν έναν ξένο ιδεαλιστή, ο οποίος γοητευμένος από την ιδέα της παραγωγής λαχανικών υψηλής ποιότητας μέσω της τεχνικής της υδροπονικής καλλιέργειας αποφασίζει να συνεργαστεί μαζί τους προκειμένου να αναβιώσει το αγρόκτημα και να επανέλθει η παραγωγή. Οι τρεις πλέον συνεργάτες, αποφασίζουν να συντάξουν ένα σχέδιο βασισμένο, τόσο στην παραγωγή και προώθηση υψηλής ποιότητας θρεπτικών λαχανικών όσο και στην δημιουργία ευκαιριών απασχόλησης για την τοπική κοινότητα, την στιγμή που η Ελλάδα εξακολουθεί να βρίσκεται σε κατάσταση κρίσης με τους ελέγχους κεφαλαίων να ισχύουν περισσότερο από 2 χρόνια και την ανεργία να υπερβαίνει το 20%.  Η FarmFresh Hellas ιδρύθηκε τον Ιανουάριο του 2016 αναλαμβάνοντας την γεωργική εκμετάλλευση. Σημαντικοί παράγοντες κινδύνου είναι:    ●    Πολύ δυσμενείς καιρικές συνθήκες, που μειώνουν σημαντικά τις αποδόσεις.●    Παράσιτα ή ασθένειες στα θερμοκήπια.●    Έλλειψη εξειδικευμένου προσωπικού.●    Χαμηλές τιμές πώλησης για μακρό χρονικό διάστημα (π.χ. λόγω εισαγόμενων προϊόντων).●    Αλλαγή στις προτιμήσεις των καταναλωτών.Πώς μπορείτε να μας βοηθήσετε χωρίς οικονομική συνεισφοράΕάν είστε ενθουσιασμένοι με τις αγροτικές δραστηριότητές μας, αλλά δεν μπορείτε να μας βοηθήσετε οικονομικά, υπάρχουν πολλοί άλλοι τρόποι για να μας υποστηρίξετε:    ●    Like στο Facebook●    Ακολουθήστε μας στο Instagram●    Επισκεφθείτε την ιστοσελίδα μας www.farmfresh-hellas.com●    Διαδώστε τα νέα μας και τις τελευταίες εξελίξεις στην οικογένεια και στους φίλους σας.●    Επικοινωνήστε μαζί μας και βοηθήστε μας να αναπτύξουμε το δίκτυό μας.

story:
My Name is Victoria. Most know me as Tori. I'm just a girl from Kansas,who took her love for life and put it on a canvas. I have emerged victorious in this battle with my past. I have discovered the beauty in life and have inspired many others to pursue their dreams.

I have an extreme passion for art and photography. I love the feeling it delivers to each person.

I am holding this campaign to help fund my move to Denver,CO.
I plan on opening a small gallery once i get settled in out there, that also specializes in helping others overcome troubles in their lives.
I am excited to begin a new journey in life, while also inspiring others to dream.

If I could raise at least $2,000 that would help rent a uhaul and pay for gas out to Denver.
I plan on selling clothing,accessories,paintings,prints and other new items on my Etsy store until I raise enough money to purchase my own space. This would honestly help me achieve the first step to this beautiful life journey.

 

Thank you for believing in me. You are what is keeping this dream afloat.

story:
Who are we?

We are a group of final year Media students at the University of Brighton engaged in an action-based learning course in which students utilise their skills, knowledge and expertise to develop community technology partnerships and activities with a view to empower and meet the needs of disenfranchised communities in Kenya. For the past 3 years the University have been developing an active partnership with community development projects in Kenya, to provide training and advice to an increasing number of communities, NGOs, and networks.

What is the problem? How are we going to fix it?

There is a growing desire in Kenyan communities to enrich and shape their futures in a world increasing influenced through information communication technologies (ICT) through education and training. Unfortunately, many Kenyans find themselves disenfranchised from participating as citizens of the technological world through lack of access to the technological infrastructure and the literacy required to use ICTs. We seek to address this disenfranchisement by empowering & supporting local communities, NGOs and youth networks through capacity building activities. Each year community media students plan, organise and implement a diverse range of ICT related ‘training the trainers’ workshops through regular dialogue with our Kenyan partners who conduct local needs analysis to inform this planning.  Our participatory learning workshops (PLWs) are especially designed to meet the needs articulated by our Kenyan partners. For example, last year’s workshops was influenced by the desire of Youth NGOs to bring young Kenyans together to discuss and promote peace in the run up to, and after, the upcoming General Election and avoid the tragic inter-tribal violence of 2007/08. The workshops, held in 3 different locations, taught over 70 young Kenyans from 6 different tribes the art of digital video production. The aim was to enable diverse voices of young Kenyans to be heard through their own stories told in their own way. The powerful stories told in the video resulting from these workshops has been used in Kenya to organise community peace forums and illustrate how people from different tribal cultures share common experiences and hopes for peace.

This year we have been asked to design training workshops to illustrate how a range of social media applications can be used to support young entrepreneurs grow their businesses; farmers in rural Kenya share agricultural information and musicians learn video and audio editing.

 

How will the money help fix the problem? / How much do we need?

The more money we can raise, the more students we can assist in community capacity building. For example, if student can teach 10 Kenyans and each of those trainees become trainers and teach another 10 then the knowledge and skills can be spread swiftly and in a manner that honours and respects local culture and customs. The community benefits of these workshops are enriched by the number of students able to share their skills and expertise as trainers. We receive no formal funding for these activities, which are totally dependent on the money we raise if they are to take place. We are currently engaged in awareness raising and promotional activities so that we raise the funds necessary to meet workshop and equipment costs, transport costs, pay subsistence costs to families we stay with.  Breaking these costs down, each fieldtrip needs to raise £1000 per student in order to organise our interventions effectively. Currently, we are hoping to take 6 students to Kenya, which means we need to raise £6,000. Students are actively engaged in fund raising activities ranging from research poster design competitions; proposal writing; scholarship applications; organising gigs and club nights; sponsored walks; cake sales and community fun days to name but a few.

We call on your generosity to support us in this work. All contributions are greatly appreciated and go a long way to supporting the project. By supporting us you are actively making a difference to the quality of people’s lives in Kenya.

Thank you!

story:
What's Going On Here?

We are attempting to create a local Buisness called: Game hub. 

Game Hub will serve as so much more than just a videogame shop. It will serve as a constant social mixer, involving: music, movies, books, comics, cards, collectibles, and videogames. It will serve as a fun and safe establishment for people of all ages and tastes. It will be a fun place where you can be with your friends and family in a very awesome relaxing atmosphere of entertainment and enjoyment. We want Game Hub to be the community core for all things video games and collectibles in the Sonora area and beyond. We want to extinguish the stigma that video gamers aren't social and live in the basement. We are highly driven and passionate individuals that love these various artistic mediums for all that they have given to us over the years. We hope to educate and enrich people's knowledge of these things and sustain the local Indie community as much as possible. We want to have a community where fundraisers for causes are constant, fruitful, and elated through the charitable nature of people everywhere. We want to be something more than just a small business; we want to be a part of the future of gaming, collecting, and openhandedness.

FUNDING

What we're asking for is pretty simple-

We are now in a situation where Game Hub might be able to open within a reasonable amount of time if we have a successful fundraiser , because at the moment our funds would be too thin to operate effectively. Any funds we gain are very usable. So, depending on how much people donate, Game Hub will open..., but we just aren't sure how long we will be able to stay open without a solid cushion. It all really depends on the people. The more funding we receive the more prestigious the project will become and For the cost of one night out with your friends you could heavily influence the success of this project.

If you can't donate a lot, that's fine. Just donate what you can and remember: Every dollar that we get puts us closer to our goal. 

What's In It For Me?

Good question. Well, take a look to the right and see the different rewards that are available for different pledge amounts. You'll notice that most of them include a newly-devolped Game Hub 'PrizeCards', which will ship once they've been reprinted. Depending on how much people contribute,  we will section off a large piece of the wall space in Game Hub and put the names (or Screen Names) of the contributor who bought that perk on the ‘CREDITS’ wall- which we think is pretty cool, in our highly biased opinion.

Below are some of the awesome Limited Edition perks you can buy. 

REMEMBER: It cost's Game Hub money to profide these perks. If you like a perk and can afford the price, Buy It! But- If you can afford a perk, but don't care for the item, contribute that amount, but don't claim the perk. 

From the creators of The Jedi Path, in collaboration with Lucasfilm, dexule [VAULT EDITION] Book of Sith reveals the mystery and madness of the dark side—while introducing new characters, history, as well as sinister insights into what it means to be a Sith Master. Availble Perk!

The extended editions of Peter Jackson's The Lord of the Rings present the greatest trilogy in film history in the most ambitious sets in DVD history. This Blu-Ray deluxe edition is a must and is an Availible Perk! (DVD Option Available. Which Will Include All Three Films As Well)

Limited Edition: 5000 

Commander Gree

Militaries of Star Wars
Sixth Scale Figure

The Commander Gree Sixth Scale Figure features:

  • Armored Body with Phase II Helmet Portrait

  • Unmasked Portrait

  • Blastech DC-15A Blaster Rifle

  • Blastech DC-17 Pistol

  • Blastech DC-15S Blaster

  • Macrobinoculars

  • Two (2) pairs of switch-out feet (action and standing)

  • Generous assortment of switch-out hands

Available Perk!(because of the extremely limited nature of the product, all who plan to buy this perk must do so by 1/6/13)

What If You Beat Your Goal?

If we beat our goal the project will become more and more prestigous with every dollar and will ensure our finacial stability. If we beat or meet our goal IndieGoGo recieves 4% of the profit, instead of 9% if we don't. So, we get more money!

 

So, What The Heck Is An IndieGoGo? 

IndieGoGo is a crowdfunding platform that is awesome and incredibly user friendly. Kickstarter, for example, doesn't allow small buisness fundraisers, so we were unable to use them for our campaign. Additionally, IndieGoGo allows 'flexible' funding because our buisness will launch and every dollar will be used wisely even if we don't meet our funding target.

 

 

What If I Have No Idea How IndieGoGo Works?

If you're not familiar with IndieGoGo or how it will work, here's a brief overview. For the next 60 days, you'll be able to make contributions to help support this project, ranging from $1 to whatever you can afford without your spouse/parent/financial advisor slapping you. For your contributions, you can select one of the reward packages—listed to the right—of equal or lesser value to your contribution. You can always pledge more than the minimum to get a reward if you want (and for some packages, you'll need to do so if it must be shipped internationally). 

 

This Sounds Like A GREAT Project, But... I Have Hesitations.

Great? Great? It'll be INCREDIBLE! It'll be like an eagle soaring in outerspace!

BUT-We Can't Do It Without You! Support is the ultimate tool for accomplishing anything within a communtiy, and with your support  we'd love to make this a reality!

How Will My Money Be Spent? 

 All of the money that we receive from this campaign will go directly towards the opening inventory costs, our rent for the first month, the equipment, furniture, design of the business, staff costs, and on a $1000 PERSONAL Sideshow Collectibles Sauron Premium Format Figure, Along, with many other PERSONAL Sideshow Collectible items. 



But Wait!- I Have A Question That Wasn't Addressed On Here! 

For questions and comments, feel free to use our contact e-mail, or, Facebook.

 

Thank You!

story:
Help Us Light Up the Night

You have probably heard by now that Toy Joy is on the move to a new downtown location. We've been very fortunate to secure a home in the middle of Austin's vibrant 2ND Street shopping district. The new location has many of the things a great toy store needs: centralized location, available parking, and a fun city to play in! 

What our new location doesn't have is a beautiful Toy Joy sign!  In fact, there is no sign there at all!  In order to complete our move to this amazing new location, we are asking for your help!  $10,000 will cover the costs and installation of a locally crafted, environmentally friendly Toy Joy sign.  

Please support Austin's Iconic Toy Store with a contribution to our Indiegogo campaign.  Help us Keep Austin Fun!

Signs and Prizes!

The $10,000 will go directly to the expense of the new Toy Joy sign and installation of the new sign.  Any extra funds will be used to clone narwhals.  Not really, but we will cross that bridge when we get there!

In return for your contribution, you will be able to select from a list of various rewards and prizes!  We've put a lot of thoughts into these treats, but if you can think of something you would rather have, just drop us a line!!

If for some reasons we don't reach our goal, never fear!  Whatever amount is contributed to this fund will go toward the Toy Joy sign costs.  The closer to our goal the better of course!  That leaves Toy Joy with more money to spend on toys for you!

Prizes will be allocated towards the end of June and beginning July based on availability.

Share the Love

Even if you can't contribute at this time (believe me, we understand), you can still support Toy Joy with your warm feelings:

* Share Toy Joy's Indiegogo campaign on your favorite social media platform

* Email the link to your folks, or send it to random people you met on craigslist

* Consider getting the url tattooed somewhere tasteful on your person.

As always, liking or following Toy Joy via toyjoy.com, facebook, twitter, tumblr, pinterest, Google+, and all those friendly platforms just makes you look cooler!  We're only looking out for your best interest!

Toy Joy loves you for reading this far!  We're looking forward to playing with you in downtown Austin!

story:
The Lockhart Family Farm is a small family business with a triple bottom line. It's purpose is to address social and environmental needs through the operation and management of a successful community-centered enterprise. Over the next few years we propose to build a successful agri-social organization that offers homesteading workshops, children’s education programs, internships to people who have been long term unemployed, community farm events, as well as developing a successful farm enterprise that donates 10% of its produce to local food banks. We will offer individuals the opportunity to purchase pigs and turkeys as babies, the ability to come to the farm to visit and share in the growing cycle progress until they are ready to be processed. Our animals will all be heritage breeds and woodland raised. The farm is designed using permaculture principals, working with nature and not against it.     

In order to do this, we desperately need to renovate one of our outbuildings into a processing room and classroom workshop, establish several ponds, and clear a bit of the woodland for and orchard. $14,300 will allow us to have all of this ready for the launch of our education program in the summer.

In all that we do, we purpose to exhibit the following values;

Natural – As much as possible we will work with nature and not against it. This includes free ranging animals, staying clear of antibiotics and hormones in our livestock, utilizing natural pest prevention systems, and natural fertilizers.

Health – We will work our hardest to produce the highest quality and the healthiest food we are capable to produce, and work to ensure that people of all income levels have access to high quality, healthy, local food.

Hands on learning – We believe that learning with the head, the heart, and the hands is the best way to learn. In that way, all of our education will engage all three elements and be person centered.

Community – We believe that food is at the heart of the community and commit to regularly working with the local community to plan and design our services. We will market exclusively to individuals and businesses within 80 miles of the farm in an effort to invest in the local economy and ensure that we support those on low or no income.

If you can't help us financially, do get in touch. We would still like to see you out on the farm. There are lots of tools here on indigogo to help you share our campain.

We will market exclusively to individuals and businesses within 80 miles of the farm in an effort to invest in the local economy and ensure that we support those on low or no income.


If you can't help us financially, do get in touch. We would still like to see you out on the farm. There are lots of tools here on indigogo to help you share our campain.

story:
Global Citizen Year is a non-profit organization which sends high school graduates to work and live in the developing world for a year, enableing them to learn about development efforts firsthand, and even more importantly, encouraging them to reconnect with humanity and global causes. The purpose of this organization is to build young "global citizens," a.k.a. highly educationed, committed world changers.

This money goes to the Global Citizen Year Fellows' Fund, which will support future Fellows so that the most diverse group of American youth possible might participate in the future. I find it extremely important that I take seriously the fundraising effort for Global Citizen Year, so that they can provide scholarships to future Fellows from all different socio-economic backgrounds. This is a cause that is so dear to my heart, considering that the funds that last year’s fellows raised are the reason I myself am able to participate.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

Tell other people you know about what we're doing.

Ask me questions: cotessier@gmail.com

Join my e-mail list: cotessier@gmail.com

Follow my blog on www.globalcitizenyear.org/

story:
I have many friends and family suffering from the after affects of Hurricane Sandy. One of my friends asked if 1st Saturdays has extra resources to send to the East Coast. Unfortunately, we do no, but that's not stopping me.

My goal is to raise $600 in 4 days. I plan on sending underwear, socks, flash lights, batteries, diapers and toiletries to one of the hardest hit areas on Long Island.

Please help me help those in need. Thanks!

story:
What's Happening

The Republican and Democratic conventions are fast approaching. The host cities, Tampa, Florida and Charlotte, North Carolina, are rolling out the red carpet for thousands of delegates, reporters, and partisans who will amass for days downtown. It would be nice if the same were true for those who plan to attend without the benefit of a convention badge.

But if recent news is any guide, protesters will face big barriers to making their voices heard. Both cities have already passed ordinances that restrict movement near the convention, allow police to search people without cause, and ban a dizzying list of household items, all in the name of security. Charlotte police are busy spending $25 million on new equipment, while Tampa's police department has already test-driven a tank down the streets of the city's financial district.

Who We Are

The National Lawyers Guild (NLG) has experience with this kind of thing. For three quarters of a century now, the NLG has been defending social justice movements, from labor to civil rights to Occupy. In recent years we’ve seen protesters subjected to preemptive raids, mass arrests, gassing, and plain brutality by law enforcement, all in an effort to scare dissent off of the streets.

We hope these scenes don’t replay in Tampa and Charlotte but if they do, we’ll be ready. The NLG will have legal teams on the ground during the conventions in both cities. Our trained Legal Observers® will be in the streets for as long as protesters are, recording arrests and police misconduct, backed by a coordinating office and 24-hour hotlines.

What We Do

Over decades of developing our Legal Observer® program we've found again and again that just the presence of Legal Observers® is enough to make police think twice about abusing the badge. And when the cuffs and clubs do come out, we don't just document brutality. That is an important part of it, but our legal help line enables Legal Observers® and protesters to call in up-to-the-minute information to an office of lawyers, law students, and legal workers. The office team, in turn, tracks people through the legal system, begins work on defense strategy, and makes sure there's a lawyer waiting in court when arrested protesters first appear.

The impact of this work goes beyond securing not guilty pleas: NLG protest lawsuits have prompted major changes to police practices in cities around the country.

NLG members will converge on Tampa and Charlotte with unmatched experience at and dedication to doing this work.

But we can’t do it without your help.

The NLG is a non-profit, membership organization, and our RNC/DNC legal team will be made up entirely of volunteers. Still, a legal support effort this large costs money. The things we need to proceed are simple: office space and office supplies, travel expenses, housing, and hats for our Legal Observers®. But every piece is vital to our effort and the costs add up.

Why Indiegogo?

The NLG is a grassroots organization and we figured, what better way to fundraise than a grassroots campaign?

How You Can Help

 

Think back. Has the NLG ever helped you or someone you know through a protest arrest? Have you ever been comforted by the sight of our green hats at a demonstration? Do you want to help fight for a world where human rights are valued over property interests? If so, please consider giving today.

Your contribution will go directly toward the nuts and bolts we need to defend protesters’ rights at the RNC and DNC. To the right are a set of suggested donation levels, but no amount is too small or large. Oh, and we’re also offering some snazzy rewards, starting with fresh NLG accessories and going all the way up to dinner with NLG executive director and mass defense expert Heidi Boghosian.

If you are unable to give but you'd still like to help, please spread the word by sharing this campaign with your friends and family members.

Indiegogo has tools for sharing through Facebook and Twitter, as well as an embed code if you would like to showcase this campaign on your website or blog. Also, don’t underestimate the power of direct contact. If you think someone you know might like to help but would be unlikely to see it online, consider emailing or mailing her or him directly. If you’d like to mail a donation and/or to make your donation tax deductible, please send a check or money order with “RNC/DNC” in the subject line, payable to National Lawyers Guild Foundation to 132 Nassau St. Rm. 922 New York, NY 10038. If for some reason you would prefer to donate to us online directly, you can do so at www.nlg.org/donate.

From your friends at the National Lawyers Guild, many thanks and a parting reminder: in order for your constitutional rights to remain strong, they need exercise.

We’ll see you in the streets.

Special Thanks to:

Ted Leo for letting us use his song "Mourning in America"

@tedleo

http://www.tedleo.com/

and Leah Goudsmit for putting it all together

http://leahgoudsmit.net/

story:
An Invitation

This is an invitation to join us in one of the most exciting journeys: To help us be able to host our four month Kufunda Youth Programme, or in other words: to help us to be able to forever change the lives of 24 young Zimbabweans and ourselves in the process :). 

Because this - in a nutshell - is what we do. We help young people wake up to who they are, to a passion and a sense of possibility that many of them had barely suspected before. Make no mistake - it is their passion and their brilliance, but we are a place - a learning village - which gives them an experience of another way of being - as a human being and as a community. We live and learn beside them for four months - during that time intentionally working to draw out and ignite their spark, their beauty, and their gift to the world.

Who are we?

Kufunda is a Learning Village in Zimbabwe, which for the past 10 years has worked with Zimbabwean communities around practical experiences of what it takes to create healthy vibrant communities. During the last two years, our emphasis and focus has moved to work with young people during longer immersive programmes at Kufunda where we experience together  how to live sustainably, how to create nourishing and resilient community and how to use projects as the vehicle to live our dreams.

And in the process our learning village has itself been ignited and brought to life, as the energy and learning of the young Zimbabweans infuses us.

What We Need & What You Receive

The programme will cost us a total of 20,168 USD. We have raised a small part of that, and need to raise an additional 17,268 USD before the end of October.

Each participant has to find $50 as a personal contribution to the programme which in rural Zimbabwe is a large sum of money.  But the cost of putting one young person through the entire 4 month programme is 850 USD.  

Most of the funds cover the food and board of the youth, a stipend for four facilitators who devote their time to this programme during the four months it runs, and some funds for guest facilitators and materials.

We offer you the opportunity to be part of our community of learning. You will receive monthly news from the youth while they are here, taking a peek into the unfolding journey that they are on with us. 

Most importantly perhaps is the knowledge that you are part of an initiative, which believes in the value and beauty of these young people - and their power to be part of shifting their communities to more connected vibrant places.

No contribution is too small.

The Impact 

From evaluation of our most recent programme, there are three keys areas that the participants particularly value:

  1. a significant shift in their sense of self,
  2. a very different understanding of sustainability and working with nature, and
  3. a deeper appreciation for community, and what becomes possible in a connected community.

In their words:

“This programme helped me to get to know myself. ‘Who am I? What do I expect from my life, what is my focus and passion for my life?’ It brought in a new beginning."

"The Sustainable Living practicals helped me to have some ideas about what I can do to live a life sustainably, and it created the love bond between me and the nature/environment. I can now consider it to be the greatest wealth I have.”

“When I saw the herbal garden it made me very happy and excited. In my community there is no such garden or herbs. I feel I need to bring these to my people.”

“Appreciative Inquiry in Community Development was helpful because it promotes diversity among people. In appreciating the talent or skill I am encouraging others in their talent to earn a better living. Some of our cultures are breaking down and I feel that in using Appreciative Inquiry I can rebuild a vibrant community."

Several of past participants have begun their own projects, as well as hosting community gatherings, sharing what they have learnt and seeking to organise young people, and the community more generally, towards community sustainability initiatives. Our ability to bring more young people from these same communities will enable us and them to grow the group of people able to enable these developments.

For more you can check out these blogs on the last programme:
  • Lights in the Darkness
  • One Month In

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether or not you are personally able to make a financial contribution, we hope you will help us by spreading the word to your friends and network, using facebook and other Indiegogo share tools. 

Perhaps you wish to reach out to a group of your friends to raise enough money among you to fund one young person's participation. This is 850 USD. And this would be so cool!

Whatever you do - please join us on facebook, and be connected to the work we are doing. 

And perhaps you even come and visit us in Zimbabwe. Maybe even in time to come and help out with this next programme. We love welcoming friends from afar. 

Thank you!
